name: Barro T23
description: The new gen for the T version!

name: Fire Emblem Engage: Fell Xenologue
description: Fight alongside new allies and old foes to quell a rising darkness in Fell Xenologue!

name: Foxblade
description: Enter a war-torn land full of dangers, find powerful weapons and artifacts, make friends and complete their quests, make enemies and hack and slash your way through them, discover the mysteries of the land and earn your place in the world.

name: Moonless
description: Moonless is a challenging side-scrolling platformer in the style of classic arcade games of the 1980s, where you control a helpless astronaut who has been left stranded on the moon, and now has to face an invading alien force to earn a chance to go home.

name: Prof. Miyamoto's Soroban & Flash Anzan
description:
Soroban & Flash Anzan is a popular lesson to improve "non-cognitive ability"!
Let's continue practicing "Flash Anzan" every day, which is the most efficient way to improve your abacus-style "anzan" skills!

name: Lost Artifacts: Mysterious Book
description:
The team of experienced treasure hunters rushes again to meet adventures!
During a regular inventory at the museum, archaeologist Claire comes across an unfamiliar book with a mysterious lock-puzzle adorned with precious stones.
After unsuccessful attempts to open the book, the girl, in anger, presses a strange mechanism, and all the stones from it fall out immediately!
The museum room quickly changes into a forest with giant trees - the book has taken Claire and the team to its world.
Will the brave treasure hunter be able to find the lost stones and return home?
Embark on a heroic mission with Claire - quench your thirst for adventure and help her find all the stones!
Convenient controls and clear training will help you easily get into the basics of the game.
Embark on an exciting journey through the world of the Enigmatic Book!

name: No Man's Sky: Interceptor
description: Venture to forsaken Sentinel worlds in update 4.2, INTERCEPTOR! Explore corrupted planets, fight a legion of challenging new robotic guardians, hijack their technology, steal their ships, harvest their resources, destroy their freighters, and much, much more!

name: Zombie jokers 2
description: Zombie jokers 2 is an arcade game where you have to survive in different locations with zombie ! You can improve the speed of your character, as well as buy him a more powerful gun! Each time, the number of zombies increases. In the game you will have to shoot different zombies.

name: Text Twist 3
description: Complete dictionaries and thousands of levels for English, German, Italian, Russian, Portuguese, Swedish, Spanish, Turkish, Dutch, and, French languages. You can use your touch screen or a mouse to play the game.

name: Hard to Make a Romantic Cartoon!
description: Yunjae possesses the body of a character in a romantic comic. Will he be able to go back to his original world? BL game 'hard to make a romantic cartoon!'

name: School Life
description: School Life is a visual novel game with a school background and a light atmosphere.

name: Extreme Offroad Simulator
description: Do you feel bored that nothing amazes you anymore? Don't be discouraged!

name: Super Death Game Show! VR
description: How did this happen? It seems that future TV shows have gone as far as they can go. Incredible cash prizes if you complete your mission, but if you fail, you'll have to go to....... We bring you the most psychotic and crazy VR experience.

name: Sorcerers Summit
description: An army of contraptions swarm the skies, and it is up to you, a lone sorcerer to defend the castle wall. Let None Pass! Move quickly, dash quicker, and bam, boom, blast them out of the skies with your magic. See how long you can last in this simple and stylish score attack game.

name: The RailIdle
description: Run the rails at the base, collect materials, and use them to head out on your adventure. The rails run automatically, so you can leave them alone! The further you advance, the more side content you unlock!

name: Wojak Wants Hentai
description: Fight the furies to gain access to a naughty gallery!Elon gives you missions to unlock Skins.Get help from Trump.And find many secrets.

name: Čendovy Patálie
description:
New Czech short story. The game takes place in Prague and also in Chotěbor. In the game you will encounter Czech dubbing. If you like the Polda game series, you will definitely enjoy this game.

The main character is Čenda, who is a bit of a jerk. He is a famous detective who solves all kinds of cases. But before you solve the main mystery, you have a lot to think about. The game also contains a few minigames.

This game was made as a school project.

name: Fight For Your Resurrection
description: Fight For Your Resurrection is a fighting game with dynamic A.I., Anaglyph support, gamepad support. When You loose a match the difficult level decrease! When You win consecutively two matches the difficult level increase! I dare You to finish the game never losing a match!

name: It Comes in Waves
description: A minimalist, experimental open-world adventure about guilt and grief. Explore, shoot, scavenge and bring a specimen to The Sanctuary.

name: Otokiyome
description: A bizarre horror adventure based on the original idea of VTuber "Shirakawa Yuri". Explore a village in the middle of the night and place a PC in a designated spot to purify the sound. A monster appears and attacks to destroy the PC, so escape while protecting the PC.

name: The Aching
description: In a dark world somewhere between dream and nightmare you find yourself alone, cold, and without memory of who you are or where you came from. Guided by little more than a silver locket and questions, you must find your way off an isolated island in pursuit of answers.

name: An Adventurer's Gallantry
description: Disgraced knight-in-training Oren gets a second chance at life as an adventurer in this fantasy visual novel.

name: Fire Emblem: Engage - Expansion Pass: Wave 4
description: Obtain Emblem Bracelets to Engage with more Emblem characters and get support items and new accessories with the Paid DLC for the Fire Emblem Engage game. Purchase and download the Fire Emblem Engage: Expansion Pass today for Wave 1 and meet Edelgard, Dimitri, and Claude (as a one Emblem Bracelet) and take on Divine Paralogues to get Tiki as an Emblem character. As more waves become available, you can test your mettle in even more Divine Paralogues, obtain Emblem characters and accessories, and experience a brand-new story with added characters and locations.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Pride of the Valley
description: Take a step through the castle’s next doorway and get ready to take in the beauty of the Lion King realm! Not only will you get to immerse yourself in a brand new, mysterious storyline as you explore this realm, but it will also mark Simba and Nala’s introduction to Dreamlight Valley. And was that a new... recipe we spied? Only time will tell! With two more new faces to look forward to welcoming to your village, here's hoping Scar behaves himself...

name: Wall World
description: Explore the mysterious Wall World on your giant robospider: mine for valuable resources, upgrade your equipment to fight off hordes of monsters, and discover exotic biomes in-between attacks. Will you be able to survive and learn the secrets of the Wall World?

name: Untold Atlas
description:
Riya Cross is sent on an expedition to explore Aethra, a mysterious island which was once a beacon of ancient technology before being lost to the depths of the sea, then resurfaced back into the world.

Led by Captain Felix Harker, Riya and the rest of her crew which includes loose cannon Eli Ryder, the accomplished Lilith Wren, the contracted scientist Alexei Nova, and the ever-pleasant Aethran guide Claris Io to embark into the mysteries of Aethra and all its regions as they grow closer to the answers behind the true source of the island’s ancient technology while diving into their own adventures and romances along the way.

name: Forests, Fields and Fortresses
description:
Forests, Fields and Fortresses - is a mix of a puzzle and a board game in which you have to build your kingdom.

In the Puzzle Mode, play handcrafted levels with a small number of pieces of territory. Your goal is to place them in such a way as to earn the required amount of gold.

In the Adventure Mode, start the game with a random map and an endless supply of pieces of territory.

name: Moviehouse
description: Welcome to the big show! Moviehouse is the game film-fans have been waiting for. Ready the camera, unleash your creativity and create the flicks you’ve always dreamed of. Grow your operation with your razor-sharp business sense and usher in a new era for filmmakers worldwide…or fail trying. After all, this business is like a box of chocolates—you never know what you’re gonna get.

name: Grimgrad
description: Build your settlement to survive all the hardships of the dark Middle Ages and not to anger the Slavic gods!

name: Agony VR
description: Agony VR is a first-person survival horror game. You will take on a role of trapped soul placed in the middle of hellish chaos without any memories about your past. During your journey, you will get to know, that the only way out of this place requires a meeting with the Red Goddess.

name: First Racer
description: First Racer is a racing game with convenient arcade control, crashes, a list of leaders, nice graphics and much more.

name: Mindhack
description: "Mindhack" is a text adventure game that turns the villain's head into a flower garden.

name: 1971: Indian Naval Front
description: Learn about the biggest naval conflict since WWII. Third-person vehicular combat game based on 1971 India-Pakistan war. Conduct missions based on actual events. Control naval units including aircraft carriers, warships, jets and choppers. Crack morse coded messages and progress through levels.

name: Remute: Decoder
description: Remute is kicking off 2023 with an ambitious, longtime dream project - a Sega Genesis / Mega Drive adaption of the german counter-cultural cyberpunk cult movie Decoder!

name: Flirting Island
description:
“Catch the heart of a millionaire!”
Flirting Island, a stimulating love reality show that the world is paying attention to.
A dazzling and steamy romance unfolds on a beautiful island!

name: Everlife
description: Sin descripción

name: Lady Thalia and the Masterpiece of Moldavia
description:
Lady Thalia is back in London and back to her old tricks, putting up with Britain’s social elite by day so she can steal from them by night. But that doesn’t mean things are easy, what with her husband back from abroad and a new detective hot on her trail. Still, she’s not going to let those little things distract her from pulling off the heist of her career, even if she needs a bit of help to do it…

Explore London, match wits with friends and foes, and steal everything that’s not nailed down (and some things that are) in this gripping installment of the Lady Thalia series!

name: In Your Youth
description: A two-player game filled with puzzles, mystery and romance! Discover clues, crack codes and find your true love?!

name: Qwert: A New Type of Word Game!
description:
Fire up the typewriter and stretch your fingers because it’s time to play Qwert – a new type of word game!
Think outside the grid in fast-paced multiplayer matches and solo games that challenge you to rack your brain for the highest scoring words you can. In Qwert, there are no letter tiles, just you, your brain and the keyboard. Battle opponents in a real-time war of words or fly solo to beat your personal best!

name: Meet Your Maker: Scorched Necropolis
description: Meet Your Maker's Scorched Necropolis Collection invites players to build and raid Outposts worthy of the Pharaohs themselves. Use ancient-Egyptian-inspired blocks, props, weapons, and Custodian Suits to create and infiltrate monumental tombs unlike any in the wasteland.

name: Truth Loop 2
description:
"TRUTH LOOP 2" is a short game (approximately 5 minutes), with a scary story and bizarre moments...

It has a "LOOP" style of gameplay, you keep repeating an action while the game and the story progress.

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Legendary Edition
description:
This bundle lets you try out the new whiteboard set and drawings.

Key features:
- 5 different themes of drawings
- 8 tools with 24 color variations

name: Super Luke Kart
description: Super Luke Kart is a rom hack of Super Mario Kart which adds new tracks and battle arenas, new drivers, and more.

name: Escape the Unknown: Awaken the Realm
description: Awaken the Realm is a fantasy RPG visual novel where you explore various dungeons to solve puzzles and fight enemies in a quest to uncover your identity and save the kingdom!

name: 4 Seasons Runner
description: Avoid the obstacles by jumping over them and beat your own highscore.

name: Road 96: Mile 0 - Full Journey Bundle
description: The Road 96: Mile 0 - Full Journey Bundle contains the critically acclaimed Road 96 and its prequel Road 96: Mile 0.

name: Meet Your Maker: Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition includes the base game and the Scorched Necropolis Collection. Build and raid in post-apocalyptic style, or use ancient-Egyptian-inspired blocks, props, weapons, and Custodian Suits to create and infiltrate Outposts unlike any other in the wasteland.

name: Double Puzzled
description:
Two puzzle games for the entire family. Play Single player Ghost Sweeper or Rusty Spout Rescue Adventure. Rusty Spout Rescue Adventure features local two player mode so you can also challenge others.

Ghost Sweeper features eight world with 8 levels in each world with secret levels.

Rusty Spout Rescue Adventure, the most colorful puzzle game ever. Story mode, Endless mode and 2 Battle mode where you can play against a friend in local multiplayer.

name: Vico 3: Tale of the Seven Seas
description: Vico 3: Tale of the Seven Seas, is one of the most unique arcade games both graphically and mechanically. Featuring Real Time reflections and Gorgeous HD graphics!

name: Fireball Spam
description: A two-button, 1 shot, 1 kill fighting game! Taking all of the action of fireball wars in other fighting games and upping the stakes with instantaneous death! No d-pad. No EX-moves, No frills. Just jump, shoot and win!

name: Mystery Case Files: The Dalimar Legacy Collector's Edition
description: It's the opportunity of several lifetimes when the intrepid Master Detective finds themselves in the body of their greatest rival!

name: The King of Fighters XV: Characters - Kim Kaphwan
description: "Kim Kaphwan" can be used in THE KING OF FIGHTERS XV.

name: Ball Drop
description: Ball Drop is a puzzle platformer game. The ball rolls down using gravity and you must use the mouse to move platforms to guide the ball to the goal line. The objects in the game rotate following the mouse and you can use them to solve puzzles and navigate around hazards.

name: 13iew
description: A girl abandoned in the basement of a hospital for some reason. Escape the hospital avoiding the doctor who abandoned the girl in the basement! Complete the story through hidden foreshadowings and various devices throughout the map and find out why the doctor abandoned the girl in the basement.

name: Planet Zoo: Tropical Pack
description: Give a warm welcome to the Planet Zoo: Tropical Pack! Adopt and care for five incredible new animals commonly found in tropical rainforests around the world.

name: Waifu Puzzles
description: This is a funny puzzle game where you need build anime girls from scattered fragments of a picture.

name: Breath of the Wild Multiplayer
description:
An online multiplayer mod for The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.
Its development started due to the streamer PointCrow offering U$10,000 for a modder to make an online multiplayer mod for The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild with some conditions, like being the first to stream and that the project needed to be finished before the release of the sequel (Tears of the Kingdom, known as Breath of the Wild 2 at that time).
Breath of the Wild Multiplayer Team, lead by modder AlexMangue, took on the challenge and released the mod in April 4th, 2023.
Since then, PointCrow started streaming the mod and recording videos of it, but Nintendo decided to take down his videos. The mod is currently unavailable for download and unsupported, as a prevention from legal actions by Nintendo.

developers.name: Breath of the Wild Multiplayer Team

name: Turing Quest
description: A party game where up to six players compete against a hilarious AI to write jokes. Using a phone or tablet as a controller, players vote on whether the AI or human players can be more entertaining. The game is designed to be played on a TV, a large monitor, or screen share for remote play.

name: Creed: Rise to Glory - Championship Edition
description:
Immerse yourself in the pulse-pounding excitement of boxing with the cinematic thrill of a blockbuster movie, as you step into the ring as an aspiring boxing champion: train under Rocky Balboa, fight familiar and unexpected contenders across dynamic arenas, and establish your boxing legacy.

Championship Edition brings an enhanced and expanded experience for new and seasoned Creed players alike with additional game content, features, quality of life upgrades and PvP cross-platform support.

name: Hello Neighbor 2: Imbir Edition
description: Hello Neighbor 2 is a stealth horror game where you're being stalked by a mysterious creature as you try to track down Mr. Peterson (The Neighbor) who has disappeared after the events of the first game. Play against an advanced, self-learning AI that tracks and adapts to your every move.

name: The Summon
description: This is an RPG where you can decide what kind of build you are going to make. Become a tank that focuses on damage mitigation, healing and reflecting damage back to your opponents or a glass cannon that focuses on high burst damage with massive lifesteal.

name: Road 96: Mile 0
description: The prequel to Road 96. Play Zoe and Kaito where it all started. Challenge your beliefs!

name: EA Sports PGA Tour: Deluxe Edition
description: The exclusive home of the Majors, EA Sports PGA Tour features Pure Strike for superior golf gameplay powered by ShotLink, and unrivaled access to the world's most exclusive golf courses.

name: The Wolf of Derevnya
description: When the villagers of Derevnya begin turning up maimed, suspicion falls on you. Track down the beast to clear your name and save the village—but to unravel the mystery, you will need to confront your own past. A survival-horror choose your own adventure set in Kievan Rus'.

name: Cursed Pantsu
description: Kaori is a good girl who always does the right thing. But one day, succumbed to temptation, she had stolen panties in the Mall... Cursed Pantsu is a story-driven action-adventure game with RPG and platforming elements about Kaori’s adventures in the Hellish Mall.

name: Meet Your Maker
description: Meet Your Maker is a post-apocalyptic first-person building-and-raiding game where every level is designed by players. Switch between roles as you mastermind devious maze-like Outposts filled with traps and guards, then gear up for methodical fast-paced combat raiding other players’ creations.

name: The Game of Fourtune
description: The Game of Fourtune has begun. Play as Clyde Raveron & Devon Rhodes as they try to survive a magical death game on the whims of a god obsessed with four. Four rounds of play, four deaths per round, one survivor granted one wish. Do you have a will strong enough that not even death will stop you?

name: Filthy Animals: Heist Simulator
description: Join a gang of mutant animals and embark on a series of hilarious heists under the guidance of Tony, the mad scientist and getaway driver as he tries to pull off his master plan!

name: Adventures of The Carrot Captain
description: Classic Platformer inside the cartoony fantasy world of a Saturday Morning Cartoon!

name: Passpartout 2: The Lost Artist
description: Passpartout 2: The Lost Artist has you back in the painting smock of your favorite green painter as you try to make a name for yourself in the art community by selling out your personal works for art that you create using an MS paint style interface.

name: Kabaret
description:
Welcome to the Kabaret - where monsters from Southeast Asian myths and folklores dwell. Decipher tea leaves, play traditional games, and question your humanity.

Cursed into a monster, Jebat journeys into a realm called the "Alam". Taken in by the charismatic owner of Kabaret, known only as The Caretaker, Jebat is tasked with providing tasseomancy services to the dwellers in an effort to gather information on how to break his curse.

Each of the mythical creatures who visit the Kabaret come from Southeast Asian folklores and legends. Listen to their unique stories, give advice through tasseomancy, and find a way to break the curse

name: Stellar Bewitching
description: A Sci-Fi turn-based RPG featuring teenage drama, touching storylines, and fast-paced battles!

name: Elevator
description: You just need to use the elevator!

name: YaoGuai Hunter
description: Yao-Guai Hunter is a Wuxia roguelike deck-building game. In a world where Yao-Guai roam free, player battles with various evil beings, collecting cards and learn inner skills. Encountering various adventures in the martial world.

name: My QLDC Level
description: A short Super Mario World ROM hack in which the main purpose is to navigate the world map, while avoiding obstacles and solving puzzles. It won the 1st place in the Questionable Level Design Contest 2023 (QLDC 2023).

name: Drevepsina
description: Combat focused minimalist RTS

name: Axel in Harlem: The Game
description: You're the chosen one to help him gather homies for... his "night parties". Guide him to victory before the time runs out!

name: Love Next Door
description: Have you ever looked at a door and thought, “Wow, I’d love to go on a date with that?” Well now you can, in Love Next Door! Swipe on a door you want to date and talk your way into their hearts! Don't worry about how unhinged they may be…

name: Pokémon Chess
description: Pokémon Chess is an unofficial Pokémon themed version of chess which combines the type advantages of Pokémon and the gameplay of chess.

name: Click Deity
description: Click Deity is here with some challenges against the gods, and here we have early access to this amazing game. You will have to enchant a lot of mythical heroes here, and it is time to make the right use of the long sword. But after all, we all need to have some better guidance to reach for the best in a game, and you can only have it from a proper beginner guide. So here we are for you to give some beginner guidance as well as some gameplay tips.

name: Another Dungeon
description:
As a young man of the Kabi, Dokebi has the lost power of his tribe.
Explore the vast continent with lots of friends and enjoy the dynamic journey!
Discover the lost power of the Kabi in Another Dungeon!

name: Potion Path
description: The king has fallen ill, and now Matteo will have to do something he never thought he would: ask a witch for help.

name: A Phone Found in Tall Grass
description:
a phone found in tall grass is an experimental visual novel made in one month. There are no choices and should take between ten and twenty minutes to read.

It tells the story of an apocalypse and three aimless 20-something adults stuck in the middle, via tweets. Read the latest news! Shitpost while hurtling towards oblivion! Tell your closest friends how much you love them!

name: Secret Pet Playmate
description: Unleash your inner fighter and take on the role of the school's most feared delinquent! No one tells you what to do—until the quietest girl in your class discovers your secret passion for writing and illustrating! The two of you join forces to keep your stories safe and explore a world of trust and obedience together. Will you be able to keep up your tough exterior while becoming someone's pet?

name: The Mega FMV Bundle
description: Wales Interactive is proud to offer the Mega bundle for their very best FMV games! Featuring The Complex, Late Shift, The Bunker, The Shapeshifting Detective, The Infectious Madness of Doctor Dekker, Five Dates, Who Pressed Mute on Uncle Marcus, Bloodshore, Night Book and I Saw Black Clouds in one bundle!

name: Path of Colors
description: Embark on a colorful adventure, mix and connect colors to reach the target base while overcoming challenging obstacles in the exciting console game, Path of Colors.

name: Epic Roller Coasters: Candyland
description: We found an abandoned shed and turned it into the most delicious roller coaster ever! This DLC includes: - Roller coaster map: Candyland. - One roller coaster cart - 1 weapon. - 1 companion character.

name: MyPopgoes
description: MyPopgoes is an entirely hand-drawn teaser game for the Popgoes series. It was created in less than a month and features visuals from Sian Mewburn (Turntail, official FNaF artist) and Emil Macko (creator of Five Nights at Candy's).

name: Day of the dead
description: A multiplayer low-poly styled zombieshooter game

name: Moon is Not the Limit
description: Reach into orbit with Moon is not the Limit! Take to the stars as a recent recruit to the space program and learn all about the science behind space travel.

name: Cartel Tycoon: Lieutenants Pack - La Familia
description: The "Lieutenants Pack - La Familia" DLC unlocks access to a set of 5 Lieutenants and their unique abilities that will aid you in your conquest.

name: Dying Light 2: Stay Human - Chicken Bundle
description: Establish a new pecking order in The City. Become a chicken that fears no one with the Rooster Suit. Cut and scratch your enemies until they become a chicken-hearted mess, and soar through the sky, proving to them all that even a chicken can fly!

name: Brain Damage
description: Challenge your skills and push your limits in Brain Damage, the intense 2D action roguelite shooter with wave-based gameplay. With each upgrade, brain damage increases, making the game more challenging as you progress. Push the game to its limits. Can you break the game before it breaks you?

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Easter Extravaganza
description: 1 Brand New Table with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Easter themed table with mobile bunny targets.

name: The Thieves!
description: The time has come to see how hard you worked at the gym!

name: Vegan Challenge
description: Action, 2D platform game. You start the game with an overweight character. The evil meat enemies, traps and minigames want to stop you. The ultimate goal lose weight and get fitter. Are you ready for the challenge?

name: Noel the Mortal Fate: Season 12
description: This is the tale of a girl who loses everything in her deal with a devil and her quest for revenge. Finally, the popular game has entered its final chapter! In S12, which serves as the prologue to the "Final Battle Arc," the story of Caron and Burrows begins to take a major turn...

name: Amigo: Kebab Simulator
description: Friend! I need your help to run my Kebab business, take care of placing the orders, keep the place clean, serve customers properly, try to have positive reviews, improve the place And, beware those of health!

name: Odyssée Numérique
description: Odyssée numérique is an educational game that will allow you to mobilize and develop skills associated with digital competence. To progress in the game, you will have to research, evaluate the reliability or credibility of the information and publish it in the vast digital world!

name: They Came from Another Planet
description: A twin stick, fixed shooter, bonus hell, pixel art, shoot 'em up. Aliens have invaded and you, a blue housecat with a stretchy head, are, of course, our last hope. Fight the aliens on earth, under the ocean and in space in this risk/reward based fixed shooter inspired by old arcade shoot 'em ups.

name: Torico's Mine Quest!
description: Clean up the mine and uncover its secrets in this game inspired by classic 90s platformers!

name: SparkleWand Puzzle
description: Unique Puzzle Game ! Seemingly easy casual game at first but will still challenge you. Test you skill and perception and try pulling off tricky shots. Fun for all ages !

name: Military Enlistment Office Escape Simulator
description: Military Enlistment Office Escape Simulator is a game that requires you to do everything you can to escape from those who are knocking on the door at the most inconvenient moment! Starring Vovochka, who suddenly knocked on the door. Open the door or not, the choice is yours!

name: Idle Universe: Planet Miner
description:
Have you ever wanted to run your own space mining company? Build your own galaxy from the ground up in this consistently updated Idle Universe Miner offline game!

Idle Universe: Offline Games is a simulation game where you can become a space business tycoon.

name: The Blocks Shoot At You
description: Break blocks and get shot at in this chaotic cross of bullet hell and brick breaker. Bounce a ball and dodge projectile patterns that spawn whenever you break a block, while controlling the ball and using abilities to clear levels.

name: Roxy Raccoon 2: Topsy-Turvy
description: Roxy Raccoon 2: Topsy-Turvy is a Tilt Maze/Labyrinth style like no other. Play through the next chapter in the Roxy Raccoon Saga, compete in various game modes and customize & create your own levels, then share them with the world!

name: Mega Demon Blaster
description: Blast demons until you can't escape no more! Mega Demon Blaster is a casual arena based shooter where you create builds for your weapon and try to break the game before you die! Enemies comes in waves and they get stronger and stronger but luckily you do to.

name: Full Metal Sergeant
description: You are a drill instructor, you have 12 weeks to turn a herd of dumb conscripts into war machines. Set their planning, upgrade your bootcamp and make sure the recruits don't kill themselves. Sir, Yes Sir!

name: Stug
description: A 2D multiplayer tank game with exaggerated shell ricochet physics.

name: Warman
description: Warman is a relaxing action-adventure game. Explore and battle your way through handcrafted challenges on your own or with your friends. Explore a vast and unique world!

name: Club Penguin Dimensions
description: Club Penguin Dimensions is a non-profit, educational recreation (under the principles of fair use/fair dealing) of the original Club Penguin game, which ended its activities in 2017. Since April 2, 2023, Club Penguin Dimensions continues the story from a new multiverse perspective, where different realities and events are interconnected by the Box Dimension.

name: Tambourine Tangerine
description: A previously unreleased map of SuperCupcakeTactics that plays for E1M1. A little bit of chaos.

name: My First Date RPG: Elliot - Story Two
description: Sin descripción

name: Tender Frame Cocoon: //Rhapsody of Cross-Pollination
description:
Deidamia Leonte has crash-landed on a desert planet... alongside the leader of the warring faction's elite cell.

The newest chapter in the long-running TENDER FRAME franchise is here.

name: The Beast of the Rosewood
description: Percival left his comfortable home to research the legends of the local villages. Eager to find and research a thrilling supernatural tale, fortune, and perhaps love, finds him when a mysterious hunter tells him about the beast that’s said to haunt his village’s surrounding woods.

name: Reaper's Goodbye
description: At a food stall serving lost souls, five troubled patrons tell their tales of woe while waiting for the midnight train.

name: Jury: Episode 1 - Before the Trial
description: A high quality, erotic, sexy and fun visual novel - and yes, there are animations!

name: A Kiss From Death
description:
1905, Sal Island, Cape Verde.

Lucinda, a curious 7-year-old girl, meets a strange and mysterious child at the cemetery. Despite their eerie personality, Lucinda finds herself drawn to the child's captivating presence and befriends them. However, their friendship is short-lived when she moves away to a different island.

Fast-forward to years later, as Lucinda returns to her hometown to get married, she is shocked to see her old friend again. But as she delves deeper into the past, she realizes that her friend is not who they seem to be, and their reunion brings with it a trail of unsettling secrets and revelations related to their separation and to her own destiny.

name: The Vampire(?) Detective and the Case of the Lying Maid
description: Enid had a crush on her eccentric lady Olivia for as long as she can remember, but she'll rather die than admit it. One day, she's summoned to Olivia's study for an unclear reason...

name: Word Solitaire
description: A Solitaire-like game where the objective is to clear the card columns by forming five letter words.

name: The Perfect Specimen
description:
You are Teagan, a Fae subject in an evil underground experiment run by the notorious mad scientist Doctor Dwight. Can you stay sane until help arrives? Or will you succumb to the Doctor’s dark experiments?

Content warning: Murder, stabbing, abusive relationship, medical horror, gore, psychological and physical torture, disturbing imagery, jumpscares, unsettling background music, drug use and sedatives.

name: Gekko: Episode of Amelia
description: In a stage where swords, machines, and ponytails appear in modern society A school love-comedy visual novel in which you can enjoy an exciting and thrilling love story This is the second installment of the Gekko series. In this work, you can enjoy the love story of Amelia, a tsundere police girl.

name: I Am the Exorcist
description: One night, you passed the park, met the miko, and then start an exorcism story with her.

name: Monster Girl 1,000
description: Embark on a journey across Elysium, battling fierce foes and exploring mysterious lands. Engage in over one hundred steamy encounters with monster girls while uncovering a mysterious plot spanning millennia. Get ready for an unforgettable journey filled with action, adventure, and romance!

name: WW2: Bunker Simulator - Hunting Wild
description: Hunting season has officially begun, and herds of animals have been spotted near the Bunker! Grab your favorite rifle, military knife, and hunt to refill your food resources. Intelligence reports empty sandbags started to appear in enemy convoys!

name: Fishjong 2
description: Fishjong is back with more colorful mahjong levels! Now play Fishjong 2! The goal is simple – clear the board by making matches. Various colors and shapes of tiles, new set and background. No storyline - just a great mahjong gameplay. Have fun playing ocean-theme levels.

name: Jigsaw Puzzles Infinite
description: Build jigsaw puzzles - solo and with friends! Assemble one of the many included puzzles, or add your own images. Customize size and shape of the pieces for any puzzle. Sit back, relax and build puzzles to your heart's content.

name: Half Life But The
description: Coming to you live, it's real, they put hlvrai in undertale.

name: Subject:Love
description:
Love. A feeling coveted by writers and detested by those who live by logic.

A natural sensation that arises at the most unexpected moment to bring out the best in you.

But what happens when someone who has never felt it before tries to understand it? How far can this person go?

A heartless witch and six confused boys join this journey for an answer.

Now. Will they find love, or will another feel awake inside them?

name: Missing Time
description: A missing Girl. A collection of Cassette Tapes. Claims of Alien Abduction. A Found footage style game with Audio Recordings and Dream-like gameplay sections.

name: Binairo
description: Binairo for Playdate is an easy to play and quick to learn logic puzzle. Fill the grid with ones and zeroes to win the game. Are you ready to put your mind to the test? Choose between 6x6 or 8x8 puzzle sizes and two different levels of difficulty: Easy or Hard.

name: Metroid: Salt Mission
description: Sin descripción

name: Terminal 69
description: Prequel to TERMINAL64 - the hypnotic dive into our hero Mario's troubled heart, now, years later, the gang comes back to continue the operatic tragedy nightmare extravaganza that takes you right up the moment Mario gets on his horse, hits that country road, and leaves the Mushroom Kingdom for good.

name: Space Scavengers
description:
Force your way through unique asteroids, stopping a long the way for needed ship and weapon upgrades to help end the the threat to humanity, a modern take on the classic Asteroids game featuring the same great asteroid destruction with modern mechanics.

Recharge your shields, Dodge the magnetic asteroids, Shatter the crystals and challenge the Living Rock to save the world from destruction.

Breakable asteroids mixed with weapons that go brrrr!

name: Valorant : Antivax Addition
description: Valorant is an 8(7 + 1 Bonus) map MBF21 episode based around that one other mod that a couple people played. The maps are built for high intensity with consistent flow, and are filled to the brim with custom content.

name: Sternly Worded Adventures
description: Sternly Worded Adventures is a roguelite word puzzle RPG inspired by Bookworm Adventures where you travel through a forested peninsula with Yorkshire-sounding place names fighting monsters with the power of words to uncover whatever dark secrets may be lurking beyond.

name: Need For Speed Pro Street Pepega Edition
description:
The Ultimate Meme Mod is BACK!
The second installment of the Pepega Mod is finally here, taking you straight into the renewed legal street racing scene of ProStreet!
Black Box’s underappreciated gem from 2007 has been given a complete overhaul featuring an entirely new story with live action cutscenes, over 80 new cars from various regions and eras, new gameplay mechanics and much more!

name: Fortnite: Triarch Nox Crew Pack
description:
The cosmetics included in April's pack have now been sent to the lockers of all Fortnite Crew members, with the option to purchase it available through the in-game Battle Pass tab to those who are not currently subscribed.

The latest Crew Pack includes:

Triarch Nox Outfit
Midnight Aegis Back Bling
Starlit Sai Pickaxe
Noxious Wrap
Photonic Legacy Pickaxe
Chapter 4, Season 2 Battle Pass (or 950 V-Bucks)
1,000 V-Bucks

name: I'll Invaligate your Aid
description: A short game where the antagonist is a lovely girl that doesn't want you to play.

name: BeatShot
description: BeatShot is rhythm-based aim-trainer that syncs targets to your music. Create custom game modes, view your stats on BeatShot's website, and make aim-training less of a chore.

name: Deltarune: Chapter Rewritten - Scampton The Great
description: Deltarune: Chapter Rewritten created by The Winterer is a roleswap AU with the spirit of a kid's cartoon, follow Asriel, Noelle and Charkis down the dreaded abyss of Kueen's dungeon and free this sad, strange little man.

name: You are Dough
description:
you are dough

become bread

name: Rayflector
description: Rayflector is a bite-sized game about using the mirrors and other to direct a stream of particles to the receptacles.

name: Hermit's Tic-Tac-Toe
description: Mark the bottom left space, mark the bottom center space, mark the bottom right space, mark the middle left space, mark the middle center space, mark the middle right space, mark the top left space, mark the top center space, mark the top right space, win with X, win with O.

name: Stroke the Koala
description: The koala, a symbol of Australia (ignore the Kangaroo), cute when dry, horrifying when wet. Luckily, this Koala is dry.

name: Kagura Survivors: Endless Night
description: Something is wrong in the Kaguraverse. An anomaly is creating tears in space-time and causing parallel worlds to converge! It falls upon Kagura-chan, the vessel of the Goddess's will, to get to the bottom of this crisis and return order to the various universes.

name: PoPuP
description: Puzzle Flatformer Game Adventures Over Obstacles at a Paper Amusement Park

name: Five Nights at Glitchsakens: Jankest Delivery
description:
Play the role of a disgruntled paranormal investigator, called out by his client to an old Fazbear Delivery Service factory, where there's been reports of something lurking around the building, still alive and functional despite years of closure.

Find his secrets, and live to tell His untold story.

Welcome to Glitchsakens Factory.

name: Poostall Royale
description: Don't let the title fool you, this isn't a battle royale game. Maybe this isn't even a game at all...

name: Musical de Primeiro de Abril
description: Rewriting a classic from YTPBR into the Visual Novel genre. Why? What you should be asking is: "Why not?"

name: CyberCum: Pussy Attack!
description: The main character (Craig) is a famous porn actor in the world of the not-too-distant future, who has invested a lot of money in upgrading his body to perform the most unusual scenes in his work.

name: Little Crab Fisher
description: An idle-clicker crab fishing game based in a fantasy world. Collect mythical crabs, travel the high seas, and upgrade your ship. A fun-filled adventure awaits!

name: Rafa's World + Axolotl + Cat Milk
description:
Take on the role of the boy Rafa in his own world full of creatures, monsters, diamonds, emeralds, boxes and a little shop to buy power-ups.

Explore over 50 different areas while trying to manage your stamina, passing through many types of traps.

This is a white little cat who loves to jump and to get into adventures around the town until he finds milk to drink. Once he accomplishes his mission, then it is time to go home.

name: Little Monki
description: Little Monki is a cute and relaxing sokoban-like game, help the little cute monkey to collect all the bananas to satisfy his hungry.

name: Panda's Village
description: Panda's Village is a real-time strategy and survival game, where you build and upgrade houses, defenses, and stores, fight fierce monkeys, purchase and upgrade weapons and magic and customize your panda. Your goal is to save the village's Capitol at all costs! If you die, you start over.

name: Well...
description:
Welcome to "Well...", a very difficult first-person precision platformer with engaging lore and storyline! In this game, you'll find yourself in a mysterious magic well with a few strange rats. To climb your way out of this unfamiliar terrain, you must strafe platform to platform while relying on your intuition for navigation. Along the way, you'll discover and collect hidden journals; these will enlighten you on the well's history. Four levels must be beat in order to save this perplexing world. The levels progress in difficulty, making your journey continually more rewarding and rage-inducing.

With its intuitive controls and fun gameplay, "Well..." is the perfect game for anyone who loves a good platformer with a twist. So why not join us on this adventure and see what lies waiting at the bottom of the well?

name: Dare to Spread
description: Dare to Spread; It is a turn-based strategy game in which we shape the course of the war by making important choices. In this strategy game you control rebel armies. We occupy enemy countries with our armies. We do illegal work to finance the army.

name: Sur5
description: Sur5 is original counter deck building game that can be played in countless ways. Select party of 5 heroes and fight against other players. Upgrade Wildcards and unlock new Heroes to expand possibilities in a post-apocalyptic world.

name: Dummy Pirates: Ocean Tales
description: From the Planet Chromatica, the first 3D TPS sailing MOBA game! Become the King-of-Dummies by competing and winning in deadly matches, while exploring the wonders of the Ocean Tales.

name: Deep Assault
description: Test your attention by keeping your rapidly descending character away from the green lights and avoid the deadly machine coming towards you from above as fast as you can! and compete with yourself by scoring more with each try!

name: Eaten by Darkness
description: Fast paced mayhem in a hellish nightmare. Feel the dread of fear lingering nearby and the exhilaration of being chased by demons and undead in this bloody violent horror first person shooter. A highly detailed Unreal Engine 5 game utilizing advanced Nanite and Niagara graphics.

name: Tragedy of Medusa
description: Three primordial goddesses and sisters decide to leave their island to visit Athens in the middle of a war waged by other gods knows as the "Olympians". Survival ultimately becomes their goal as the Olympians seek to destroy them.

name: Solomon Snow: First Contact
description: Sometimes when you come to work, the Solar System is under attack. Glakmirk battle cruiser has landed on Neptune and portals to the other planets are open, and as Solomon Snow - an ordinary security worker, have to deal with an alien army coming out of the gateway in the Futuresalt Corp.

name: Crab Champions
description: Claw your way across exotic islands combining fluid movement with fast paced combat to become a Crab Champion in this third person shooter with roguelike elements.

name: Nautikin Adventures
description: You are the Nautikins, the dominant species on this ocean planet! Build boats, planes, and helicopters to explore a vast sea filled with islands and mysteries. Play in a sandbox with unlimited parts or a campaign where you strive to reach your goals. Embark with online multiplayer or singleplayer.

name: Royal Kingdom
description:
From the creators of Royal Match comes a brand new match 3 puzzle adventure in Royal Kingdom, starring the extended Royal Family!

You’ll meet King Richard, King Robert's younger brother, as well as a charming cast of new characters, including Princess Bella and the Wizard, to embark on a journey to build legendary kingdoms! Solve match 3 puzzles to explore new lands and defeat the Dark King & his army!

name: Real Hentai Situation! DT
description: This newest entry in the Real Hentai Situation series brings all of the sex appeal and laughs you've come to expect, and more!

name: RunieStory
description: Befriend locals, romance a girl, or even go on an adventure for money for gifts! An action RPG inspired by Stardew Valley and Rune Factory where you befriend or romance townsfolk or go explore dungeons. There is a lot of things to do such as farming, cooking and hunting! The main goal is to get married and get to know everyone the exploring dungeons.

name: Hart's Toil
description:
Hart's Toil is a puzzle-adventure game inspired by the cruel game design of La Mulana and NES games. Solve 2-4 hours worth of puzzles and collect items that will allow you to solve more puzzles. Defeat the witches of the underground to gain the materials needed for a ritual that will let you escape hell.

The mechanics of the game are simple. You can move in 4 directions, interact with things in front of you, and use items in your bag. The environment and roaming creatures can damage you, and you will die if your HP reaches zero. Some items may require MP to function, specially items used to kill enemies.

The puzzles are mean and intentionally obscure. It is recommended that you play along with a friend sitting by your side and solve the puzzles together.

name: Missile Defence
description:
There are two dead safe methods to survive a nuclear attack with ICBMs. Defence with anti missiles and "Duck and Cover" where a simple desk will defy a multi megaton nuke. Your mission is to protect six major cities against a global nuclear attack, else perish with them.

You control three anti ICBM missile launch sites, if you run out of missiles or all your launch sites are destroyed you are out of luck until the end of the stage.

name: Monaco Master
description: You’ve secured pole position and you’re clear of the field. But this is Monaco and a momentary lapse of concentration could mean the difference between certain victory and failure. Not to mention, you’ll have to navigate your way around the backmarkers, and some of them seem less than keen to move aside. Prove to them that you are the true Monaco Master!

name: Souls
description: The story of Souls begins; an ancient continent broken apart. A world now completely consumed by darkness.

name: World End Heart Girl
description: After a certain mission, a bunch of Songstress' Songbird Angels were given their own HEART WORLDS to look after as a prize..... with loads of awesomefun humans in them...... wow....

name: Dream Town Island
description:
Give free reign to your creativity in this inventive town sim!
Unlock new stores and facilities, help your residents find love, or cash in on the stock market!
If you founded a new town on an uninhabited island, what would you build there? Restaurants? Convenience Stores? Movie theaters? Make your choices and create a town that everyone will want to move to!

name: Weird West: Definitive Edition
description: Discover a dark fantasy reimagining of the Wild West where lawmen and gunslingers share the frontier with fantastical creatures. Journey through the story of a group of atypical heroes, written into legend by the decisions you make in an unforgiving land. Each journey is unique and tailored to the actions taken - a series of high stakes adventures where everything counts and the world reacts to the choices you make. Form a posse or venture forth alone into an otherworldly confines of the Weird West and make each legend your own.

name: The Dawn is Inevitable
description: The Dawn is Inevitable is an interactive crime drama/neo-western novel inspired by classic RPG games. A mysterious stranger is forced to hide in a village called Rassvet. This place is isolated from the outside world for the whole winter and keeps many dark secrets.

name: Indagator
description: A visual novel fangame.

name: Just Kiss Her Already!
description: Just Kiss Her Already! is a fluffy girls love story about Nanala (from Just Kiss Him Already!) attempting to get a girlfriend!

name: Be A Rock
description: A unique 3rd-person exploration game set in a beautiful open world. Your spirit is born in the form of a rock as you explore canyons, deserts, and volcanic lands in order to uncover secrets of the past. The game features puzzle solving, and a distinct storytelling style. For fans of Journey.

name: Fashion Contract
description: Fashion designer Jessica and her model friend Rebecca want to rise in their careers, and they join the fashion show. Both girls can help each other at this event.

name: Breakfast Bar Tycoon: Multiplayer Edition
description: This bundle includes base game and Multiplayer Mode DLC.

name: Breakfast Bar Tycoon: Multiplayer Mode
description: This DLC features an exciting local multiplayer gameplay mode, allowing players to team up and play together. It adds a new layer of excitement and replayability to the game, while providing a fun and engaging experience for players to enjoy with friends and family.

name: Couch Co-Op: Urban Flow + Knights & Guns
description:
Looking for fun and addictive games to play with friends? The "Couch Co-op Bundle" is perfect for you! It includes the games:

- Urban Flow - control traffic lights in a bustling city, manipulating the flow of cars and making sure everyone gets home safely.

- Knights and Guns! - a medieval-themed action game tin which players team up as knights and fight hordes of monsters using various weapons and special abilities.

Experience a variety of gameplay experiences - "Urban Flow" is a fast-paced puzzle game, while "Knights and Guns" is an action-packed adventure. It's a great way to bring people together and have fun in a group - which makes it perfect for parties!

name: Food Truck Tycoon + Flowlines VS
description:
Enjoy the two in one gaming bundle with Flowlines VS and Food Truck Tycoon:

In Food Truck Tycoon, test your skills and talent as owner of a busy food truck, where your only job is to take orders, prepare food and serve as many customers as possible. With 150 levels to explore and over 50 dishes to serve, players can upgrade their ingredients and bar decorations, and complete achievements to become the tycoon of the best food trucks in the city.

In Flowlines VS, a classic puzzle video game for 1 or 2 players, players will compete to solve puzzles by pairing up all the matching sockets on the board with continuous lines, without crossing over other lines or branching off. With time-limited stages or a limit on moves per stage, it's a game that's easy to play, but hard to master.

Try out this bundle today and become the ultimate chef and puzzle solver!

name: New York City Driver
description: Explore the streets of New York in ultra realistic detail! Cruise along Broadway, Wall Street and the famous Avenue of the Americas, including Times Square!

name: Boom Royale
description: Boom Royale - Shooting Game Boom Royale-building Flash is intense combat multiplayer! Take on up to 8 players online in this 2D game with cartoony visuals and gameplay between Soldat and Halo, inspired by the shooter Mini Militia and Teeworlds.

name: Betrayal of Blood
description: An atmospheric 2.5D RPG that follows Thallia, a 15-year old girl from a formerly prosperous family, having her world upended when her father sells her off to the Labour Force for a few measly coins. Time to decide: slavery or freedom!

name: Crosswalks
description: Crosswalks in a visual novel that tells different stories when you switch among perspectives. In 2018, an explainable portal appeared under the city of Sanghville, linking two parallel universe together. On one side there are dozens of unsolvable crimes, while the other side was always peaceful...

name: Hex Plat
description: The Game Is A Simple 2.5d Platform Action Game. The player can move and jump. That and solve puzzles using little gimmicks in the stages. The objective of each stage is simple: manipulate the spheres to reach the red glowing tiles, that's it.

name: Mars Colonization
description: The time has finally come when we can enjoy a new stage in human development!

name: League Funny
description:
A battle royale game with MOBA gameplay and customizable characters based on KOL internet celebrities. It was released for April fools by the Taiwanese website League Funny, or Game Smash, which is a social media site and video platform originally focused on promoting e-sports communities and discussion.
The game was available for a month before going offline but may be back next year according to the updated trailer description.

Thrilling battlefield, spectacular fights! With numerous unique and stylish characters, the 'Game Brawl' is about to bring you an unprecedented fighting experience!!

name: Landfall Archives
description: Break into the Landfall Archives to steal and play previously unreleased games, demos, interactive slide shows, and even an unreleased version of Totally Accurate Battle Simulator from 2017!

name: Irradiant
description: Silence the shrine. Irradiant is a small score-attack action game by a solo developer, where you're faced with destroying mischievous spirits bewitching a shrine as fast as possible.

name: Kill Your Shapes
description: Kill Your Shapes is a third-person shooter roguelike set in a world where reality and creation has been simplified down to shapes. Kill the enemy shapes and get new items and abilities. There are several levels and bosses to beat.

name: Shirime: The Curse of Butt-Eye
description: In Shirime: The Curse of Butt-Eye you find your missing girlfriend Sharon in Shirime Forest, stalked by the malevolent yokai Shirime. Collect pages to uncover the mystery, but beware: every page increases the intensity of Shirime's pursuit. Can you survive and unravel the truth?

name: Video Horror Society: Anomaly
description: Expand your monster roster with our most spine chilling monstrosity yet. The shapeshifting Anomaly introduces an all new paranoia-inducing playstyle that will have your foes shaking in their snow boots... Trust no one.

name: An Elmwood Trail
description: An interactive mystery game. You play as a private detective trying to solve the disappearance of 18-year-old Zoey Leonard. Using the phone she left behind, you'll investigate her friends, family, and Zoey herself.

name: Charm Studies
description:
Charm Studies is a lo-fi picross game about young witches studying magic. You play as Cassia, an airheaded girl who's currently failing charms class... Luckily, Senna has agreed to tutor her! The only problem is she's not very nice... Can these two little witches learn from each other through the magic of puzzles?

The game includes a small tutorial for those who are new to picross, but you won't fail if you make mistakes either. You can still see all of the story regardless of your picross skills.

name: The Murder of Sonic the Hedgehog
description: A brand new Sonic experience from the minds of the Sonic Social team: The Murder of Sonic the Hedgehog is a visual novel, point-and-click adventure! It's Amy Rose's birthday and she's hosting a murder mystery party on the Mirage Express. When Sonic becomes the game's victim, everyone is off to get to the bottom of things. However, something feels a bit off - is this really an innocent game or something more sinister afoot?

name: Sex x Hex
description: Sin descripción

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming - Ultimate Edition
description: Discover a new world of fun! Dive into Sport & Fun: Swimming and use your Joy-Con controllers to experience the cutest challenge in your life.

name: Sherlock Purr: Extended Edition
description: Sherlock Purr is a fun and engaging children's game where players help the feline detective search for hidden objects in an apartment. With colorful graphics, entertaining animations, and brain-teasing puzzles, this game is perfect for young minds who love mysteries and cats. Follow Sherlock Purr's pawprints and solve the mystery today!

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Premium Edition
description: Play S.N.I.P.E.R., the latest sniping game where you aim, fight and destroy virtual enemies. Try different types of missions, inspired both by classic rail shooters and modern cover shooters. Fight your way out during day and night, destroy evil forces and unlock new weapons and power-ups.

name: Skullgirls: 2nd Encore - Black Dahlia

description: The third Lin Shanhai case involves a severed female corpse found hanging in an abandoned factory, missing from City A's hospital morgue. With the body assaulted and police stumped, you'll search multiple crime scenes to unravel this mysterious case.

name: Ghosts over the Water: Changing the Tides of Japan's Future
description: Ghosts over the Water: Changing the Tides of Japan's Future is an engaging strategy-based, multi-route historical visual novel. It is designed by a team of four undergraduate students associated with University of Texas, Austin's Japan Lab and Epoch Games Initiative.

name: Ultimate 4x4 Offroad Parking Trucks: Car Driving Racing Simulator 2023

name: DobbyxEscape: Pirate Adventure

name: Darksy's Adventure
description: Darksy's Adventure is a 3D platformer with furry characters and abstract 3D worlds. Tail whip and pounce your way to victory!

name: Xiaomei and the Flame Dragon's Fist
description: Save your sister from the darkness in this authentic 16-bit kung fu action game, releasing outside Japan for the first time!

name: Retro Golden Age: Goody
description: Goody, the original spectrum action, platform and puzzle game from the eighties, puts you in the shoes of an expert bank robber in an updated version for Steam with improvements such as saving, filters and screen settings and achievements with the best Spanish hits.

name: GunSuit Guardians
description: Gear up your GunSuit and defend Earth from an alien siege! Equip and upgrade unique arsenals of overpowered weapons to survive overwhelming numbers in this action-roguelite twin-stick horde survival.

name: Pop Some Eyes
description: Pop Some Eyes is a FPS game where you control Mr. Pineapple Bundy, in a space jail where he must fight aliens to survive. The game features fast-paced action, unique sci-fi/comedy storyline, and 3 different weapons. Help Mr. Pineapple navigate the dangers of the space jail and defeat alien forces.

name: Hot Pussy College 2
description: Hot Pussy College 2 is a short adult Visual Novel focusing on the fun parts of college life. The game is packed with humor, romance, and lots of sex. Play as a young male attending college at B&R and guide him through the experience.

name: Speed Dates
description: Embark Speed Dates, where you control first dates with 18 attractive women in this interactive FMV game. Shape your story with charm and humor for a personalized romantic journey.

name: Beton Brutal
description: Climb a massive overgrown concrete tower while constantly at risk of falling and losing precious progress. Beton Brutal offers a fluid and responsive first person parkour experience through tranquil brutalist architecture.

name: Hot Secretary Puzzle
description: Hot Secretary Puzzle - is a simple yet tempting 2D puzzle game about the pleasure of having a secretary. But not a regular, a hot one!

name: Sexy New Year
description: Sexy New Year - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Deltatile
description: Deltatile is a puzzle game based on a unique tile swapping mechanic, featuring 6 different worlds and over 65 levels.

name: The Great Divide
description: The One Being, the Goddess who ruled it all, one day grew tormented by the actions of its own creations. That frustration led to what is known as The Great Divide. Now the world faces unbalance as those spirits fight each other for full control.

name: Obsta-Loop
description: The Spiritual Successor to our NES classic, Exit-Loop. Its the new most Fun-Zaniest, Insaneist, Death-Loopiest, Crypt-Pillageist experience ever! Now with power-ups, masks, Multiplayer on PC.

description: After starting a relaxing job at the oceanfront ice cream shop on Calypso Island, things get hectic when all of Papa Louie's crazy customers arrive on the island! Now it's up to you to single-handedly craft and serve tasty sundae treats throughout the year. You'll whip up delicious Freezer sundaes by pouring ice cream, adding mixables and syrups, blending sundaes, and finally adding whipped cream and toppings for that perfect summertime treat. You'll need to multitask between each area of the restaurant, where each station is a unique hands-on experience.

name: Yellow History
description: In this labyrinth, governed by his feelings, Thomas seeks his release. How to wake up from this nightmare? Is there a way out?

name: Hot Coffe Shop
description: Unlock a total of 20 (animated and static) images through combat with other girls! You must withstand the largest number of waves, the further you get, the better the reward will be!

name: Temanava
description: TEMANAVA is an Adventure/Exploration game where you play as a co-pilot who survived a crash. You will have to learn an unknown language in order to communicate with strange islanders and use your mysterious powers to find your commander!

name: Cloud House
description: Cloud House is a revival of a physical location of a performing arts space, Centre 42 within the digital realm. It features both an interactive multiplayer world as well as a single-player theatrical experience titled 'Love Letters to 42'.

name: Baalzebub
description: A turn-based infernal dungeon crawler.

name: Protos Magos
description: Protos Magos is a Spellcrafting FPS with fast-paced combat. Explore a medieval setting and blast your way through a horde of demons. Create custom spells to suit your unique play style.
