name: Traffic Brains 2
description: Fix urban traffic issues by placing road signs and programming traffic light patterns. Create green lanes, and divert traffic!

name: Retro Golden Age: Operation Alexandra
description: An arcade video game with adventure elements for the Amstrad CPC, which takes place in an abandoned Nazi base from WWII.

name: Island Bender
description: Island Bender is a physics-based couch-fighting earthbending game with up to 6 players. Throw rocks at each other, collect power-ups, and master your bending style to beat your opponents.

name: Cycle Chaser H-5
description:
Mysterious Aliens have occupied a scorched Earth. A lone pilot seizes the skies. What is it they're after?

Cycle Chaser H-5 is a horizontal arcade-style shoot-em-up. Burn through waves of impenetrable foes with a sleek arsenal of weapons. Defeat foes to harvest their energy, then activate the powerful 'Super Tatsujin' system for maximum power and defense!

name: Bombe
description: Minesweeper, but you only solve each situation once.

name: PumPum 2
description: PumPum comes back with new sexy girls, new game genre, lots of levels and colorful, juicy, extraordinarily hot animations! Don't waste your time on anything else, go and check PumPum 2!

name: Poozle Mania
description: Poozle Mania is an addictive hentai puzzle game with many hot girls that you must collect! Each girl shows off lovely graphics and animations!

name: Family Curse
description: Family Curse is a mystical horror from the first person with a frightening atmosphere. Immerse yourself in the intricate history of the Crouse family and find out the terrible secret of the people who died in the cursed house.

name: NinjaFall
description: NinjaFall is a ninja combat game. Inspired by new-classics from Duck Game to TowerFall, it's a 4-player local and online fighting game centering around creating your own Ninjutsu to use in versus matches.

name: Ankora: Lost Days & Deiland: Pocket Planet
description: Discover the wild planet Ankora and explore freely around this mysterious world full of promise and danger. Craft different tools, build structures and terraform yourself a new home in this cute-as-heck survival game.

name: Formula Retro Racing: World Tour
description: A retro racer updated for the modern age, rediscover nostalgic racing as you drive through iconic locations in Formula Retro Racing: World Tour. Fusing 90s-style arcade racing with realistic physics, split-screen multiplayer, and 60fps performance. With new tracks and car types!

name: I Love Finding More Pups: Collector's Edition
description: Who doesn’t love finding pups?

name: Rex
description: Rex is a steampunk game in which you control Rex the cat to create crazy builds, defeat evil Draconians and race your name to the top of the leaderboards!

name: Spike Mtn
description: Use your grappling hook to overcome challenging obstacles and reach the top of Spike Mtn! Spike Mtn is a 2D precision platformer with a fun and retro atmosphere.

name: Shukuchi Ninja
description: Shukuchi Ninja is a fast-paced, high intensity arcade game with unique controls

name: The Legend of Aurum Draconis
description: A medieval fantasy RPG-inspired play-and-earn adventure, set in an evolving digital universe replete with mystery, magic and danger.

name: AsteRoid Rage
description: Destroy everything in this short casual physics game!

name: 7 Days Heroes
description: A 2D pixel action game. Control a squad of four characters to fight against zombies!

name: Phantom Tentacle
description: Phantom Tentacle is a story decryption game! The sealed ghost tentacles descended on the town again. Players will play ghost tentacles, attacking lone villagers, capturing nuns, and sneaking to escape from the hunters of knights. Finally rule the whole town!

name: Xordle
description: A daily word guessing game where players must uncover two secret words on one shared board. The secret words share no common letters. Has both a daily and an unlimited variant.

name: Retro Golden Age: Livingstone I Presume
description: David Livingstone, famous English missionary and explorer, went to Africa on a sanitary and cartographic mission to establish the Zambeza and Nile river basins when he disappeared...

name: VR Archery
description: VR Archery is an exciting fast paced arcade / shooting gallery style game that delivers on a truly immersive approach to experiencing archery in virtual reality.

name: Solbane
description: Battle against bosses in a top-down action shooter with minor RPG elements. Choose between three diverse classes, each with a unique arsenal of abilities.

name: Return to Empire
description: Sin descripción

name: Ninja Scroller
description:
Ninja Scroller is a challenging pixel art action runner game with a retro gaming vibe, where you will face ninjas, wolves and tornadoes.
You have to collect the 100 Shadow Scrolls and defeat the Guardians, Ninjas and Wolves, within the time limit.

name: Crush the Industry
description: Claw your way to the top of a big game studio in this roguelike deckbuilder inspired by classic JRPGs!

name: Project Mirror
description: Welcome to Project Mirror, a mind-bending action puzzle game. Take control of both yourself and your mirror image as you strive to solve increasingly difficult puzzles that will test your cunning, intellect and skill. Putting your reflection in harm's way could lead to failure...

name: Troublemaker
description: Troublemaker tells the story of friendship, chaos, romance, and strife between school gangs. Defeat the enemy gangs, Seize their territory, And become the ruler of the School in the Strongest High School here.

name: Samurai Slaughter House
description: VR-only physics-based combat game. Use stealth and creativity or brute force or take on your foes in a vast physics based sandbox. Battle both humans and demons while exploring a large metroidvania-style open world. Collect items and power up your character. Explore towns and interact with NPCs.

name: Hill Agency: Purity / Decay
description: Murdered sisters, mind altering drugs and flying cities, to a case that goes way further than the banks of this one detective's little neighbourhood in this Indigenous cybernoir detective narrative adventure set in a post-post-apocalyptic future.

name: Elle
description: Elle is an exciting puzzle game in which you have to collect coins while avoiding encounters with labyrinth keepers. This game is inspired by the legendary Lode Runner.

name: The Witch, the Ghost and the Snake
description: Sin descripción

name: Punch Out
description: Sin descripción

name: Xanthiom
description: Sin descripción

name: Delve into Pawssion
description:
Delve into Pawssion is a NSFW Adventure/RPG combined with mild Visual Novel mechanics, such as building up affection with characters, completing their quests, making choices that can alter some scenes, and rewards or reactions from characters.

This game is heavily based on rewarding the player with NSFW art.

name: Nightmare House
description: You are trapped in a nightmare. Observe the house and try to escape from this nightmare house.

name: BUMP! Superbrawl
description: BUMP! Superbrawl is a 1V1 action strategy game set in a fantastical Utopia. Join an all-new competition with mythical heroes from around the world and become the ULTIMATE CHAMPION! Face off other players in action-packed strategic battles, test your skills in a variety of competitive game modes, switch up your tactics to master new challenges and climb your way up through the leaderboard!

name: Franky's Adventures
description: Join Franky on his Adventure! Wherever he goes, excitement and hi-jinks are sure to follow! Compete against other players in an infinite runner-style game and collect as many apples as possible!

name: Cloak & Dagger: Shadow Operations
description: A short, single player, third person, tactical stealth action game set in the early 1990's meant to be finished in one sitting. Use the shadows, shoot out lights, stun enemies, and conceal yourself in the darkness through 5 Missions.

name: Magic or Machinations
description: Design your own character and choose their personality with a dialogue between you and a sentient AI drone in the middle of space. Then wake up in an open-world desert and try to find your way home by discovering new abilities and using them to cross time and space.

name: Human or Not?
description: Chat with someone for two minutes, and try to figure out if it was a fellow human or an AI bot. Think you can tell the difference?

name: Return to Grace
description: A daring space archaeologist has just unearthed the ancient resting place of a long lost A.I. god known as Grace. Adventure with various fractured A.I. personalities as you uncover the great mystery of why she was shut down all those years ago.

name: OrbRider
description: OrbRider makes indoor cycling fun! You ride and explore up to 7 different tracks and biomes as you take on multiple challenges, gather resources, and unlock new and undiscovered areas. Personal ANT+ USB hardware dongle and ANT+ enabled speed sensor or smart trainer equipment required.

name: Root: The Underworld Expansion
description: Conquer new battlefields as you journey into the Underworld of Root!

name: The Emperor Penguin Keita
description: Keita, an intrepid emperor penguin, gets lost during his migration and begins an extraordinary adventure on the ice alone.

name: VDSC Battle Royal
description: An Island, a bunch of dragons and guns. Volt Inu's Sailor Club invites you to the greatest battle of your life. Fight 24 other players for Honor, Wealth and Power. Land in strategic locations, loot weapons and supplies to survive the battlegrounds and be the last to be victorious.

name: White Wolf: Darkside Chronicles
description: Enter Darkside of "White Wolf" story how evil got trapped in chest in snow cave. When you opened chest you felled into magic dream realm spell to enter "White Wolf" mind to corrupt into "Dark Wolf. Let evil adventure begin!

name: Super Pokémon Eevee Edition
description:
This fanmade game combines classic Pokémon games with a Final Fantasy-inspired gameplay system that offers completely unique pokemon adventure.

It has varied lineup of features including an active battle system that allows your party of four Pokemon to battle at once, an equipment system to customize your pokemon, legendary summons to assist you in battle and pokemon that have infinite movesets so you never have to forget a move.

name: Train Simulator Classic: Wasatch Grade Scenario Pack 01
description: Experience all the appeal, excitement, and challenges of Union Pacific railroading during the remarkable 1960s - with Wasatch Grade Scenario Pack 01 for Train Simulator Classic!

name: The JOTA Collection
description: The Jump Over the Age Collection brings together the critically acclaimed In Other Waters, where you play as an Artificial Intelligence guiding a stranded xenobiologist, and Citizen Sleeper, a gripping adventure inspired by the flexibility and freed

name: Golazo! 2: Pixel Soccer
description:
This bundle comes with:
- Golazo! 2
- Golazo! 2 Pixel Stars

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Accolade Set Bundle
description: This content requires the base game Insurgency: Sandstorm on Steam in order to play.To celebrate 4 years of Sandstorm, and the incredible support from the community, get moving with the Accolade Set Bundle. Featuring premium gear and battle-worn weapon skin sets, the bundle is packed full of community-driven content.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Pilot Gear Set
description: Soar to victory as the maverick you are with the Pilot Gear Set for Security. This set contains five different cosmetic gear pieces.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Worn Veteran Weapon Skin Set
description: Flaunt your experience with the Worn Veteran Weapon Skin Set for Security. These skins can be applied to six different weapons.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Rust & Wrap Weapon Skin Set
description: This content requires the base game Insurgency: Sandstorm on Steam in order to play.Embody the grizzled fighter within you with the Rust &amp Wrap Weapon Skin Set for Insurgents. These skins can be applied to six different weapons.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Biker Gear Set
description: This content requires the base game Insurgency: Sandstorm on Steam in order to play.Tread on your enemies with the Biker Gear Set for Insurgents. This set contains six different cosmetic gear pieces.

name: Tormentor
description: Are you ready for an adrenaline-filled adventure? If yes, then it's time to take your weapon and join the ultimate shooting game - Tormentor!

name: Bubble Puzzler
description: Bubble Puzzler is a great shoot-a-puzzle game for the whole family!

name: Fury Roads Survivor
description: Drive your modded vehicle through a post-apocalyptic wasteland and defend yourself from motorized scavengers who want your fuel and flesh.

name: Tetris Colossus
description: This is a complete reworking of Game Boy Tetris into an original game called “Tetris - Colossus“. This is essentially Tetris with giant blocks! Some changes have been made to accommodate those bigger blocks and it ends up being quite fun.

name: Golazo! 2: Pixel Stars
description: Experience a whole new way of playing Golazo!

name: Madness Brutal Fighting
description: Welcome to «Madness Brutal Fighting - Mortal Fight Battle Attack Multiplayer» a fighting game that will test your skills against other players and AI-controlled opponents in a world where only the strongest survive.

name: Idle Simple RPG
description: A simple placement game, which only needs to set the role to fight, can achieve full automatic combat.

name: Arcade Archives: Navarone
description:
Take control of a fighter plane on a mission to destroy enemy targets of various sizes scattered across a peninsula.
When you take down a major target, all of the minor targets around it will be destroyed with it. You get a bigger bonus from taking out the targets with fewer shots, so aim carefully!

name: Digital Diamond Baseball V11
description: Digital Diamond Baseball is a statistically accurate baseball simulator and tabletop board game companion.

name: Rogue-Fp
description: A blend of old school gameplay and new school controls. Experience a classically styled roguelike in a way you never have before! In first person!

name: I Love Finding Furbabies
description: Collect cute furry creatures in this engaging hidden object game.

name: Asteroids: Multiplayer
description: A modern version of the classic arcade game

name: Ratyboy Adventures
description: In this 3D platformer game where we play as a mouse living in a big house, we try to collect the stars placed at certain points in the rooms of the house and overcome the challenging platform

name: Hentai Ariel
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Squares and Numbers
description: A beginner friendly abstract nonogram puzzle game.

name: Some Spring Days
description: This game is a visual novel game about some spring days when a sensitive girl meets a upperclassman and loses herself in thought. Play time is very short, about 10 minutes. About 20 stills.

name: Wizardry: The Five Ordeals - Scenario "Prisoners of the Battles"
description: Wizardry: Prisoners of the Battles is a DLC scenario for The Five Ordeals in which the adventurers face relentless challenges in their attempt to aid the local royal guard.

name: Jurassic World Evolution 2: Feathered Species Pack
description: Expand your Jurassic World with the incredible Jurassic World Evolution 2: Feathered Species Pack. Featuring three land-dwelling dinosaurs and one flying reptile, these eye-catching feathered species will help you evolve your park like never before.

name: Wastelan Wars
description: You come out of the Vault, build a magnificent city.

name: Deep Space Scoundrel
description: Deep Space Scoundrel is a rouge-like space adventure where you use a variety of classic arcade mechanics to explore the universe, customize your ship, land at spaceports, and fraternize with other aliens and low-lives.

name: Citizen Sleeper: Episode - Purge
description: With the release of Episode Purge, Citizen Sleeper’s three episode post-launch DLC expansion is now complete and the game has even more to offer with a thrilling late game storyline that delivers an immersive new narrative arc introducing additional characters, lore and locations. Players returning to Erlin’s Eye might even find themselves running into some familiar faces!

name: I Commissioned Some Dogs
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy world, and hide as many dogs and bones as they could inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 15 art pieces to choose from, and 1500+ hidden objects, you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: That's My Family: Family Fun Night
description: Family Fun Night is the first game from That's My Family to offer both original board games and classic games that were part of your childhood! Play 14 different games, from Snakes and Ladders to Parcheesi, Chess and 4 in a Row, and many more!

name: Across the Obelisk: The Wolf Wars
description: Travel back ten years and live the tale of the legendary Wolf Wars seen through the eyes of Magnus and Yogger with this new Story Pack, and unlock a new character, pet and new skins along the way.

name: Winning Post 10
description: The latest in the horse racing simulation series Winning Post, celebrating its 30th anniversary!

name: Adrenaline Dungeon
description: Adrenaline Dungeon is a top-down dungeon crawler game, play as an unknown man stuck in a time-looped dungeon. Uncover clues to discover a new order trying to rewrite history. Use different weapons and abilities to escape the dungeon and prevent history from being rewritten.

name: Eggsplorer
description: A game in which you control an egg-shaped player to explore 4 unique levels.

name: Assault Suits Valken Declassified
description: The definitive retro mecha game! Assault Suits Valken is a mecha shoot-em-up released by Masaya in 1992. Pilot your Valken mecha across 7 stages.

name: Dredge: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: The ultimate pack for your impending voyage. The Dredge Deluxe Edition includes everything you’ll need to weather the seas and trawl the deep for sinister secrets.

name: Untold Love Stories
description: Untold Love Stories is a collection of visual novels in different genres and styles. Romance, meetings, dangers, adventures and even mystery are waiting for you!

name: BookyPets Legends
description: BookyPets Legends is a videogame of adventure, exploration and collecting, whose main objective is to encourage children from 7 to 12 years to read in an easy and funny way.

name: Dredge: Deluxe Edition
description: The ultimate pack for your impending voyage. The Dredge Deluxe Edition includes everything you’ll need to weather the seas and trawl the deep for sinister secrets.

name: Royal Affairs
description: At your exclusive boarding school, will you rule the roost or be a royal disaster? Court publicity, sway the fate of nations, and find love!

name: Pyramis
description: Pyramis is a H.R Giger & retro-scifi-inspired survival horror game, that will bring back the genre to its roots and modernize it in the process. The game is driven by its story, beautiful environments, exploration, and horrific themes.

name: Doodle World: Deluxe
description:
Doodle World Deluxe includes the original version of Doodle World and the all-new game, Doodle World Redrawn!

Doodle World features an innovative "Kids Mode". With "Kids Mode" younger players can enjoy the game with more lives, less levels, and easier enemies and bosses!

Doodle World Redrawn is a new, never before released, re-imagining of Doodle World with tougher levels, enemies, and bosses! Use the new double jump ability to navigate through these tougher levels. "Kids Mode" is still available in this new version, so even younger players can enjoy this new game!

The music and sound design for Doodle World Deluxe was created by the extremely talented chiptune artist Takumi Grainger!

name: Crystal Storm
description: Play as a wizard invading worlds and casting powerful spells in this action roguelike mixed with mining and resource management mechanics

name: Roterra 4: Magical Revolution
description: Games presents the newest member of the Roterra family: Roterra 4: Magical Revolution. This new installment of the chart-topping series offers 35 levels of all new hand-built puzzles that intensify the perspective challenging journey through this fairytale world of gravity twists, scrambled paths and rotating blocks. 70+ unique puzzles await the player as they travel through mysterious lava-filled caves, explore icy extremes and devastating deserts, and interact with the world of Roterra in new ways.

name: Shadow Empire: Oceania
description: The new maps being generated with Oceania DLC change the feel and ambiance of the game completely. But it also changes the gameplay a lot and will make you experience a different style of game.

name: Undead Horde 2: Necropolis
description: Become an Undead King and raise undead minions from the remains of your enemies. Command an undead army and rebuild the Necropolis after the vile attack by the living. Undead Horde 2 is an action game with elements from RPG, strategy and hack'n'slash.

name: Prison Life 2
description: An online game that you'll play with 3-11 players as a Prisoner or a Guard and will try to escape or prevent escapes. Loot, Craft, and make your way to the exit, or investigate and arrest wanted players as a guard!

name: Zed Zone
description: A great catastrophe has come, and you, who are on duty, crash and trapped in a Zed Zone. There are zombies and monsters everywhere, In order to escape, by collecting materials, upgrading skills, building shelters, defeating zombie waves and mysterious mechs, chasing a glimmer of hope.

name: Ravenbound
description: Fear everything and nothing for death brings you closer to victory in this challenging open world action-roguelite. As the Vessel of an ancient power you must use steel and skill to complete your mission in a dangerous fantasy world inspired by Scandinavian folklore.

name: The Great War: Western Front
description: The Great War: Western Front is the definitive WW1 strategy game. Play a deciding role in history with this real-time tactical experience as you take charge in the iconic Western Front from 1914 to 1919. Pick your faction and lead your forces to victory.

name: GunSoul Girl 2
description: This is a third-person shooting game.The story takes place in the future world, because of the doomsday worldview caused by the proliferation of artificial intelligence viruses. You will use the gunsoul girls to complete missions and fight against evil organizations, mutant monsters and more.

name: Roterra 3: A Sovereign Twist
description:
Return to the magical world of Roterra where up is relative and the path ahead may actually be behind. Rotate, flip, and shift to change your perspective, find your way out of complex mazes, and claim the crown of Roterra. Sometimes changing your point of view makes all the difference.
In this continuation of the chart-topping Roterra series, Angelica and Orlando face off to rule the floating cube world where gravity is no obstacle.

name: Rally 9000
description: Rally 9000 is a simple 3D rally game. Complete tracks as fast as possible, and unlock levels and upgrades!

name: Saga of Sins
description: Saga of Sins is an unholy action-adventure where mystery meets rewarding arcade gameplay! Immerse into a world of stained glass that is stained by sin.
Detective visual novel about mysteries of rural Russian town in 90-s, anime style.

name: Anyaroth: The Queen's Tyranny
description: A pixel-art, platformer adventure game with lots of action and a memorable story. Dive into the depths of planet Anyaroth and free its people from the tyranny of the Queen. Join the Rebellion and fight against the Regime’s mind-control system. The anya civilization needs you!

name: Wars of Prasia
description:
Wars of Prasia is a large scale real-time PvPvE game focused on siege warfare for control over territory and resources.

The game started development with the idea of regular players getting to enjoy large siege battles without the typical time investment required for it in other games.

name: Defi Kingdoms
description: DeFi Kingdoms is a cross-chain, play-to-earn game built on a strong DeFi protocol with plans to become a fully-fledged MMORPG in later phases of the Roadmap. The game features DEXs, liquidity pool opportunities, and a market of rare, utility-driven NFTs, which all together create a beautiful, immersive online world in the incredibly nostalgic form of fantasy pixel art. DeFi Kingdoms currently lives on the Harmony and DFK Chain blockchains

name: The Last Worker
description: The Last Worker is a first person narrative adventure centered around our struggle in an increasingly automated world. Combining a hand crafted art style with uniquely immersive gameplay mechanics in an epic setting, The Last Worker delivers an emotional, thought provoking and comedic story packaged with rich characters performed by an all-star cast.

name: Dredge
description: Dredge is a fishing adventure with a sinister undercurrent. Sell your catch, upgrade your vessel and dredge the depths for long-buried relics. Explore the stories of the strange locals and discover why some things are best left forgotten.

name: Block Buster
description: Block Buster VR is an action-arcade game that’s all about creative demolition. It combines full-body destruction with cosplay, collecting, and crafting. Players will tear through cities, toss tanks, smash buildings, nibble people, and leave a wake of annihilation in their path in this homage to classic Kaiju monster films.

name: Infinite Guitars
description: Fight mechs with metal-crushing rock in Infinite Guitars, a genre-melting Rhythm RPG featuring vibrant anime-inspired art and a blazing original soundtrack. Battle against war machines with electrifying Guitar Solos, and save the planet!

name: Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon
description: Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon is an open-world RPG full of complex quests in which your decisions matter and your choices are respected. A vast world full of monsters, fallen heroes, and exciting places to discover.

name: Vertigo 2
description: Vertigo 2 is a single-player VR adventure. Explore the depths of the vast Quantum Reactor as you descend to finish your journey home.

name: Lunark
description: Lunark is a 2D cinematic platformer in the vein of '80s and '90s classics. Run, jump, hang, climb, roll, and shoot your way through mysterious alien ruins, a flying penitentiary, a high-tech megalopolis, and a majestic forest.

name: Uragun
description: You are a friendly-but-deadly Mech on a journey searching for your missing pilot in this action-packed roguelite shooter. Choose your missions and rewards, research skills, equip expansions, mod your weapons, install plugins, customize your looks and stylishly cut your way through hordes of evil AI.

name: Cursed Mansion
description: Cursed Mansion is a horror adventure RPG that focuses on nuances and eerie feelings which happens throughout the adventure.

name: Jigsaw Boom 2
description: Jigsaw Boom2 is a jigsaw puzzle game. In this game a player assembles a picture of certain number of puzzle elements.

name: Thorns & Spells
description: Thorns & Spells is a cross-platform 2D MMORPG in alpha testing with an emphasis on real-time combat and open-world exploration. In the game, players can create and customize characters, socialize with others, compete in rated PvP, and explore an interactive and expansive online world.

name: Golden Rails: Valuable Package
description: Sin descripción

name: Garden Harvest
description:
It’s Spring and you have entered an amateur gardening competition with three of your best friends.

You each have received a small patch of land. Show us what you can do by having the largest harvest, and winning the competition!

name: Half-Life Alyx NoVR
description: Half-Life Alyx NoVR is a mod that lets you experience the next story in the Half-Life universe on a flat screen, without any VR equipment. It adapts most of the VR interactions and features to a traditional mouse and keyboard setup, such as gravity gloves, weapon upgrades, cranks, doors, cabinets and more. It also supports many other workshop mods that enhance the gameplay and visuals.

name: Quiz Thiz Croatia: Bronze Edition
description: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Metal: Hellsinger - Dream of the Beast
description: In the Dream of the Beast DLC, make the Hells fear the beat with two new songs (Cristina Scabbia from Lacuna Coil and Will Ramos from Lorna Shore), a new weapon, and three outfits with unique gameplay bonuses.

name: Reincarnated
description: This was a fanmade project and video based on "Garten of Banban" by the Euphoric Brothers. This project was made purely for practice and fun and is not for profit. Please support the official releases of the Garten of Banban series.

name: Furry Furries
description: Lewd furriness meets polished match 3 gameplay in this no-patch, no-ads, no-purchases casual game!

name: Sparky Marky
description: Explore an abandoned children's recreational camp and uncover the dark secrets covered up by its founders. Find clues and apply specific commands in the Discord channel to find out what truly happened. But be careful: Sparky has been activated and the monster inside of it never sleeps…

name: The Cycle: Frontier - Breakthrough
description: The third season of The Cycle: Frontier.

name: Basilisk 2000
description:
Explore an unfinished RPG through its level editor.

The spiritual successor to the unreleased Super Nintendo game Basilisk. This project seemed far more ambitious, but somehow almost became lost media.

Developed around Y2K by an unknown studio, the game was thought to be lost until a fan designed a wrapper program in Unity to load its level editor. Now the potential can finally be seen and its mysteries laid to rest.

name: Suprabac
description:
Do you like the Scattergories game ?
You will love Suprabac !
Compete against your friends and be quick to find the right words !

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: Sweet Cakes
description:
This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces". The following 10 puzzle images are included.
- Strawberry Mousse Cake
- Chocolate Cake
- Fruit Tart
- Raspberry Roll Cake
- Mont Blanc
- Cheese Cake
- Cream Puff
- Matcha Mille-crepe Cake
- Tiramisu
- White Mousse Cake

name: Pixel Paint: Definitive Edition
description: Pixel Paint is anything but a classic coloring book. The point of the game is for you to put your mind at ease, follow the numbers and fill every last pixel with a corresponding color.

name: Theatrhythm: Final Bar Line - NieR Pack
description: A pack of additional music tracks to use with Theatrhythm Final Bar Line.

name: Zombie Garden vs. Plants Defence
description: In Zombie Garden & Plants Defense game, you take on the role of the principale character whose mission is to protect her garden from the onslaught of zombies. As you progress through the game, you will need to plant trees strategically and purchase workers who will collect resources like water and wood to help you fend off the zombies.

name: Brain Memory: Definitive Edition
description: Brain Memory improves on the classic formula of memory games. It lets you increase the difficulty level at your own pace, and customize challenges to one's taste.

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: Close Up Animals
description:
This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces". The following 10 puzzle images are included.
- Asian small-clawed otter
- Lion
- Koala
- Bengal tiger
- Hedgehog
- Cat
- Red panda
- African bush elephant
- Giant panda
- Ringed seal

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: Exotic Travel
description:
This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces". The following 10 puzzle images are included.
- Osaka Castle, Japan
- Phuket, Thailand
- Sanfeng Temple, Taiwan
- Chiang Mai, Thailand
- Lempuyang Temple in Bali, Indonesia
- Ulun Danu Beratan Temple in Bali, Indonesia
- Kuang Si Falls, Laos
- Chefchaouen, Morocco
- Trang An, Vietnam
- Hoi An, Vietnam

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Flying Circus - Volume II
description: Above the brutal meatgrinder of the Great War trench warfare there was a ballet of winged machines made largely of canvas and wood, piloted by knights for a new age, who dueled to the death in a most personal way.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Spitfire Mk.XIVe with Teardrop Canopy
description: The Spitfire Mk. XIV was originally built with a “high back” rear fuselage which restricted visibility to the rear of the plane. To rectify this problem, the Mk. XIV with a cut-down rear fuselage and tear-drop canopy began to be developed and built at the end of 1944.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Pack: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate - Jiu Jitsu
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Model Builder: Titan-Forge DLC No.2
description: Expand your collection of fantasy figurines with our second Titan-Forge DLC pack! The Titan-Forge DLC no. 2 brings four new models to the base version of Model Builder, including: Elf Male Wizard, Tiefling Female Warlock and Human Female Rogue. Get building, get creative!

name: Survival Sprint
description: Try your best to choose and match different weapons, supportive items and also your unique active skills. Your goal is to survive!! Use coins to upgrade your characters, unlock new characters and also maps.

name: The Illusion: Curse
description: The Illusion: Curse Is a horror game made by professional crew In the art of horror. You will have the opportunity to experience one of the most powerful types of psychological horror Based on an environment designed in every detail to be a real hell that makes you terrified.

name: Revenant
description: Revenant is a pixel-art style shooting game set in the near future.

name: Ainmora: The Impending Disaster
description: A captivating RPG with interesting mechanics and unique challenges that will make you think strategically as you admire the immersive history of Ainmora. Think about each choice. Explore carefully. Aziron, Kiarah, Roberit and many others await you in Ainmora.

name: The Most Lecherous
description: The first erotic game for young people, why pay when you can play for free?

name: Escape Rooms Bundle
description: Four escape rooms developed by mc2games included! Palindrome Syndrome, Tested on Humans, Between Time, and Regular Factory.

name: Robocock
description: Far future. All maral principles have been erased, complete debauchery and chaos are happening on the streets. An unknown company creates an advanced robot to fight depravity and lust in the name of family values.

name: Vagrant Knight
description: Vagrant Knight is a topdown challenging action roguelike with elegant hack-n-slash combat with spell casting. Mow down and clear each room of demonic spawns to level up your character with unique melee attacks and spells. Try different combination of special attacks and spell in each level.

name: Turn on the Lights Carefully
description: A minimalist puzzle game about connecting and disassembling circuits.

name: Naive Riri
description: Naïve Riri is a match 3 game. You need to go through many interesting levels, breaking power crystals and rescuing girls from Evil! You will see fun and addictive gameplay, beautiful music and incredible anime style!

name: Lumien
description: Lumien is a fast-paced third-person platformer in which you explore the ruins of an ancient civilization and breathe life back into it. On your way past the various defenses, you'll be helped by the Orbs, fueled by the mysterious powers of the civilization.

name: Lil Spoops
description: Lil Spoops is a 2-4 player top-down supernatural rogue-lite shooter where you play as possessed toys that battle each other to entertain the Entity, which grants players unique powers and abilities at the end of each round.

name: Linked Worlds
description: Eleven years ago the Dark Beast was sealed by the four heroes. Now, with the heroes nowhere to be seen, it's up to Albus to defeat the Dark Beast before it regains its full powers.

name: Forkscythe
description: Are you ready to test your skills and bravery in the ultimate horror action game? Introducing Forkscythe, a retro FPS unlike any other. Set in a nightmarish world overrun by attacking skulls, you'll need quick reflexes and strategic thinking to survive!

name: Overdelivery
description: Overdelivery is a frantic top-down goods delivery simulator. Drive against the time to deliver goods without customer complaints. Upgrade or buy new bikes and cars to unlock new kinds of goods. Unlock new areas of the city, travel around, and explore an open environment.

name: Active Soccer 2023
description: Explosive retro arcade action is back! Active Soccer 2023 is an exciting retro arcade football game providing a fast-paced arcade experience, implementing amazing playability and responsive easy-to-learn/hard-to-master controls.

name: Adventures of DaKoo the Dragon
description: Adventures of DaKoo the Dragon has over 150 levels, using a randomized vortex level rollout to make every run of the game unique. Animations, enemy spawning, and attacks are all randomized to enhance the immersion. With multiple ways to attack you will take on 5 Bosses among multiple obstacles.

name: PictoPull
description:
Solve 3D block puzzles built from pixel art.

Pull, push, and climb on the blocks of a PictoPull puzzle in order to reach the goal. Puzzles are simple to learn but complex to master, as puzzles get bigger, more complex, and new special tiles and mechanics are added onto them. Once you have mastered all of the 150+ PictoPull levels try creating your own in the fully featured level editor and share them via the Steam Workshop.

name: Raidborn
description:
Enough of wasting precious time by walking eternal distances and engaging in endless dialogue? Want to get to the fun part quickly? Say no more! Raidborn should be right up your alley.

Raidborn is a straightforward first-person fantasy action RPG featuring procedurally generated dungeons and quests. Plunder a treasure-strewn world, upgrade your gear, level up your skills, and hurl yourself into intense combat.

name: ACL Pro Cornhole
description: Play against top ACL pros in the most realistic Cornhole game ever created!

name: Battle Tracks
description: Blast through waves of enemy brigades or compete against your friends in Battle Tracks, a top-down action-adventure. Fight your way across unknown battlefields and against thousands of enemy tanks. Earn stars to compete against the enemy boss and advance to the next arena!

name: I Love Finding Critters!: Collector's Edition
description:
The Collector’s Edition includes:
- 6 extra locations: find even more critters!
- 12 additional minigames
- Downloadable wallpapers and music player
- Meet the developers' adorable critters!

name: Tuwas vs. Muda
description: Real-time economic simulator of an up-and-coming company. Earn profits by distributing the orders to the machines as efficiently as possible. Expand the machine park to be able to accept more and more complex orders.

name: Forza Horizon 5: Rally Adventure
description: Your Forza Horizon 5 Rally Adventure is here! Drive purpose-built rally monsters and conquer the rugged Sierra Nueva. Join three rally teams and attack Horizon’s most thrilling routes ever in Timed Rally and Multi-Car Races. Feel the intensity of massive dust trails and deformable roads in 10 new cars and experience the bursting flames of anti-lag. Explore dramatic craters, an abandoned quarry and an entirely smashable palm forest.

name: Gripper
description: Gripper is a story-driven action game with boss fights on wheels. Tear your enemies apart with a grappling hook. Rip out their metal hearts to gain abilities. Rescue your family and uncover the secrets of the collapsing world.

name: Terra Nil: Vita Nova
description: Vita Nova is the first major update for Terra Nil, introducing 5 new missions, which means new biomes, nine new buildings, an updated world map, new achievements, new handbook pages, new music, a new animal and an overhaul of the wildlife system.

name: League of Enthusiastic Losers: Definitive Edition
description: Just because others call you a loser, doesn't mean you are one. Make the journey to the 90s Moscow and experience an adventure about friendship and finding your true self.

name: Craft Of Mine
description: Your uncle, an employee from Mojang Studios, the company that develops Minecraft; has disappeared with no seeming reason. Sad for your uncle, you go to your room to play that same game, still unknowing of the answers you would be getting.

name: The Return to Bloody Nights
description: Get ready for a spine-tingling lore focused experience with our new fnaf fan game, "Return to Bloody Nights." Inspired by FNaF Plus, the original 4 FNaF games, and the books by Scott Cawthon, this game takes its own unique twist on the timeline and crucial events of the Five Nights at Freddy's series. With a combination of old-style atmosphere and gameplay, along with new mechanics, our game brings the best elements of the official games to the table. It's a reborn version of our previous game, "Bloody Nights at Freddy's."

name: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys - Decorations Pack 9
description: Enjoy new decorations in the ninth official DLC.

name: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys - Director's Cut
description: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys Director's Cut is a fun-centric party game which throws you (along with your friends) into a series of challenges and races throughout randomly generated tracks. Enjoy new decorations and get ready for loads of fun.

name: Family Chess: Amazing Edition
description: This bundle includes 3 DLC skins for the chessboard.

name: I Was Dead, But…
description: Playdate game about being a cranky ghost who wants to be left alone, made in Pulp

name: All Goblin
description: All Goblin is a surreal third person experience containing jumping puzzles, interconnected world design and a semi-automatic slingshot. All Goblin is an ever expanding Goblin Game, it contains the necessary components for a Goblin related experience.

name: Initial Drift Online: Car Pack
description: This DLC allows you to unlock 3 new unique cars!

name: The Shadow Warrior Trilogy
description:
The Shadow Warrior Trilogy includes all three games in the fast paced first-person shooter series:

- Shadow Warrior
- Shadow Warrior 2
- Shadow Warrior 3: Definitive Edition

name: Jigsaw Puzzle: Baby Animals - Expansion Pack 2
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle: Baby Animals - Expansion Pack 1
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle: Baby Animals
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Novus
description: Gorilla Tag meets FPS. It's that easy.

name: Red Man Follows
description: Red Man Follows is a short (20min - 30min) game that follows the story of a human of light who heads on the worlds darkest place...

name: Save Our Solar System
description: Save Our Solar System brings a fresh look on the tower defense genre. Shape the world around you with a lovable playable character. Harvest metal to upgrade towers. Collect rocket parts to advance to further planets. Fend off endless waves of asteroids.

name: Destiny 2: Armory Collection
description: Over 20 Exotic weapons including the famed Gjallarhorn! Instantly grow your armory with 3 Exotic Ciphers and a coveted collection of cosmetics. Then conquer two dungeons and a raid, all while discovering new weapons and armor inspired by Bungie's past.

name: Baker Business 3: Spring Pack
description: Welcome spring into your bakery! Bake fresh spring themed recipes, hunt for hidden Easter eggs to earn tickets, put out baskets full of candy for your customers, and decorate your bakery with flowers, butterflies, and more!

name: Draggexath's Dominion
description:
"You are a young warrior returning from a long quest. When you return home to sleep something strange happens. You begin a new quest in search of the legendary demon god to get out of the now strange world that you once knew..."

Draggexath's Dominion is a Adventure RPG where you play as a young warrior trapped in Draggexath's Realm of Darkness. Your quest is to find him and end his tyranny once and for all.

name: 3D Miner
description: A casual strategy mining game The game is designed with 30% luck + 40% aiming power + 30% decision (product mix) to determine whether you can finish the game In the mine with limited resources, with props, to maximize the benefits.

name: Super Retro Kart
description: Take a spectacular blast to the past and join Retro HD and his retro pals in Retro Land as they star in the amazing SMK Hack that is Super Retro Kart, yes Retro HD now has his own game where he stars as one of the main characters so now it’s Retro’s time to shine. Join the Retro gang as they race through 16 new and 4 original retro themed tracks and try to take home the gold.

name: Combat Mission: Battle for Normandy - Market Garden
description: CMBN Market Garden Module is an add-on Module for Combat Mission Battle for Normandy that portrays the famous battles for the bridges over the Rhine.

name: Combat Mission: Battle for Normandy - Battle Pack 1
description: Battle Pack 1 for Combat Mission Battle for Normandy expands the experience of the Western Front by covering the period of combat between Normandy and Operation Market Garden. Designed by veteran CM scenario designer Jon Sowden.

name: Combat Mission: Battle for Normandy - Vehicle Pack
description: Vehicle Pack for Combat Mission Battle for Normandy brings some interesting oddball vehicles to the Western Front environment. From the rather obscure Halftrack U304(f) repurposed French halftrack to the more famous Churchill Crocodile there's plenty of fun in this Pack.

name: Combat Mission: Battle for Normandy - Commonwealth Forces
description: CMBN Commonwealth Forces Module is an add-on Module for Combat Mission Battle for Normandy that brings British, Canadian, and Polish Allied forces to fight in France.

name: Chef Life: A Restaurant Simulator - Al Forno Pack
description: Make delicious wood-fired pizzas and give your restaurant an Italian ambiance with the Al Forno pack. Get 8 pizza recipes and a wide range of customization items to decorate your restaurant.

name: 0xFF
description: Work your way across endless terrain and toxic water in search for a way to stop the energy outburst that will end all life.

name: Unsolved Case: Murderous Script - Collector's Edition
description: The life of a detective is unpredictable and very dangerous. You never know what awaits you around the next corner and what secrets you need to unravel. But you knew what you were getting into, there's no turning back!

name: Poly Jigsaw: Animals
description: Poly Jigsaw: Animals is a traditional style jigsaw puzzle game, with a cute animals.

name: Monster Factory
description: Play as an unknown organism with different abilities bent on devouring everything in its path. Start as a small blob, rolling around absorbing objects, eating bigger and bigger objects as you go.

name: Pencil Plus: The Wrath of The Spankster
description: Pencil Plus: The Wrath of the Spankster is an interactive novel style choose your own adventure game in which players take the role of Conner, a normal high school kid that gains a very unique super power: the ability to pull limitless pencils out of his pockets.

name: Reclusive
description: Robert Livingston sails to a remote northern island to spend the last days of his life on it and encounters unexplained phenomena and creatures.

name: 1000 Man General
description: Command an army of 1000 troops. Create squads from a variety of unit types and give them orders to perform devastating strategic maneuvers. Then lead your army into battle and slice the opposing army into pieces.

name: Pineapple on Pizza
description: Pineapple on Pizza is a short game about exploring an island full of dancing people, finding a way to ruin the party, and unexpectedly enjoying it.

name: Sifu: Arenas
description: You can test your skills against the clock and waves of bad guys

name: Final Dose
description: Final Dose is an immersive stealth simulator game inspired by slasher horror movies. You are being pursued by a relentless AI that can see and hear you. You will need to explore every inch of an abandoned clinic and find items and puzzle pieces to unlock doors and crawl through vents. Run or hide under beds, in bathroom stalls and cabinets, crouch to move around silently, and do whatever it takes to figure out how to escape this place!

name: Subtension
description: Outfit, crew and command your submarine to save what's left of humanity beneath the seas of a ruined earth. Man your sub's systems and take aim in this real-time strategy epic! Inspired by FTL, this subnautic student project serves as our first 2-semester release.

name: The Secret of Darkwoods
description: Open-world procedural illustrated text-based RPG

name: ZaBaTa!
description: Play Hide and Seek with AI and humans - Find out who is pretending to be an AI!

name: MLB The Show 23
description: Shock The Game. Own The Show.

name: Random Chat
description: Based on the weekly Naver Webtoon 'Random Chat,' this new visual novel breathes life into the story by re-forming it into a love simulation game!

name: Chef Life: A Restaurant Simulator - Al Forno Edition
description:
Make delicious wood-fired pizzas and give your restaurant an Italian ambiance with the AL FORNO pack. Get 8 pizza recipes and a wide range of customization items to decorate your restaurant.

The Al Forno Editionof Chef Life: A Restaurant Simulator contains the base game and the following content:
- A new type of dish to add to your restaurant menu: pizza
- A new cooking station to make delicious pizzas: wood-fire oven
- 8 pizza recipes (with 3 upgrade levels each): Neapolitan, vegetarian, seafood, cheese, spicy, BBQ, Hawaiian, mountain

name: Ikemen Villains: Wrapped in Wicked Romance
description:
The setting is in 19th century England. There exists an organisation mandated by Queen Victoria named the Crown. While working as a postal worker, you accidentally find out their secret.

Turns out there are Fairy Tale curses placed on members of the Crown, and those who are born with the curse will inevitably follow the same fate as the story.

You escaped death by becoming a Fairy Tale to record their curses. You are forced to live a life full of alluring sins with nine beautiful villains…without knowing that you will fall into a love affair that will change everything.

The darkest and sexiest addicting love story from the Ikemen Series. You won’t be able to go back to the love you once knew until you experience this one!

name: Crime Boss: Rockay City
description: Crime Boss: Rockay City is an organized crime game combining first-person shooter action and turf wars, playable solo or with friends. Take on the role of Travis Baker – a man with his sights set on becoming the new King of Rockay City, one crime at a time…

name: Train Life: A Railway Simulator - 1920's Orient-Express Train
description: Take the controls of the legendary Orient-Express steam train operated by the Compagnie Internationale des Wagons-Lits and retrace its storied route, only in Train Life!

name: Super Greedy Cat
description: Help King-Meow to collect gold to increase your cat speed and make the higher score in this precision platformer.

name: Faraway Proximity
description: Faraway Proximity is a third-person puzzle game about recovering lost books. You have been contacted to recover a set of misplaced books. Find them by solving different types of challenges and uncover more puzzles by reading their contents.

name: Deadnaut: Signal Lost
description: Deadnaut: Signal Lost is a sci-fi horror turn-based roguelike where loyalty isn't earned - it's installed. Scavenge derelict ships and abandoned moons filled with hellish creatures, brutal AI and insanity storms. Gather gear and upgrades to fight or evade the hi-tech supersoldiers hunting you down.

name: Drop: System Breach
description: Welcome to Drop, a fast-paced action-strategy hacking simulator. Ready to hack your way to fame and fortune while avoiding getting caught? Use stealth and cunning to maneuver between the ongoing power struggle of corporations and factions to control the fragmented networks in the city.

name: Fractured Sanity
description: Fractured Sanity is a single-player game developed exclusively for VR; a heart-wrenching experience mixing puzzle elements with survival horror, inspired by classics like Silent Hill and Resident Evil. Every interaction was designed to create an immersive VR world... and make you run for your life

name: Brotato
description: Brotato is a top-down arena shooter roguelite where you play a potato wielding up to 6 weapons at a time to fight off hordes of aliens.

name: Bullet Casters
description: Bullet Casters in an unconventional Shoot ‘em Up game with a local PvP mode where you can challenge your friends and create your own bullet hell or face a single-player mode that will test your skill and wits.

name: Johnny Chainsaw
description: Johnny Chainsaw is a narrative-driven indie platformer where players don’t have a jump button. Immerse yourself in this story of power structures, ethical dilemmas, and struggles in responding to change. Unravel the a destructive secret and decide the world's fate.

name: Cyber Cult City
description: Cyber Cult City is a hoverboarding and hacking Cyberpunk roguelike focused on hit and run tactics.

name: Terra Nil
description: Terra Nil is an intricate environmental strategy game about transforming a barren wasteland into a thriving, balanced ecosystem. Bring life back to a lifeless world by purifying soil, cleaning oceans, planting trees, and reintroducing wildlife, then leave without a trace.

name: Death Roads: Tournament
description: Combine deadly racing, deckbuilding, and roguelite style to get car battles unlike anything before! Choose a driver, car, weapons, and sponsors to overcome tactical encounters. Adapt to an ever-changing race to come out on top and earn entry into the last safe haven on the Divided States of America.

name: Innchanted
description: Innchanted is a co-op adventure where you discover magical potions, serve otherworldly guests, and pacify monsters. Gather your party and journey on a quest to overcome the evil Wizard – your landlord!

name: Summer Daze at Hero-U
description: Summer Daze at Hero-U is a light-hearted interactive tale of friendship, fun, and folly suitable for all ages. It's up to you to save the upcoming Harvest Festival at Hero University from imminent disaster... or make it even worse!

name: Socrates Jones: Pro Philosopher
description: After an unfortunate accident, bumbling accountant Socrates Jones must find "the nature of morality" by debating philosophers to earn back his life. More than slightly influenced by the Ace Attorney series.

name: Touch Type Tale
description:
A boy is wanted for his nimble fingers by four rivaling dukes and duchesses of a kingdom in turmoil.

Touch Type Tale is a real-time strategy typing game featuring a story rich campaign and online competitive play.
Challenge your friends in a battle of tactics and typing skills!

name: Fallen Star
description: Jump and fight your way up through this vertical platformer through various short levels, and challenge yourself to keep up the combo's.

name: Autogun Heroes
description:
Warm up your fingers, because this game will demand the best from you.
Take back the control of an alien-infested world in this next-gen, non-stop 3D action platformer with overloaded guns, a team of heroes and blast those back where they came from!

name: Summon Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Shootagem
description:
Shootagem is a lightgun based puzzle game for the Sega Master System.

Shooting a gem will drop the gems above it down. By shooting out gems, match 3 or more gems in a row or column to score! Clearing multiple sets of gems in quick succession will add to your combo which will increase the points scored.

The timer is ticking down and it's game over when it hits zero. Clearing rows and columns will add time to the timer and you'll get more time added for longer rows of gems. After clearing enough lines, more and more worthless rocks will start to enter the play area which you'll have to clear them out by shooting them.

name: You Have 1 HP
description: A 32-level megawad full of bite-sized combat puzzles & challenges (and GZDoom gimmicks). As the title suggests, you have only 1 HP. Kill all enemies to progress. ﻿All the levels are designed to be beatable in under a minute, with the majority being beatable in under 30 seconds.

name: Cat City
description: In this game you will need to explore the whole city, as well as many other rooms to find all the seals! A cat named "Ponytail" will help you figure out the game, and will fully introduce you to what is happening in this cute little cat town!

name: |][-@I7 in vitro #Dead in Vitro
description: "|][-@I7 in vitro #Dead in vitro" is a vertical scrolling bullet hell shooter developed by Cupro Laboratory. Control "Ferrum" a boy who was newly born as a zombie in a certain laboratory, and confront powerful enemies.

name: Architecture Zeitgeist
description: Architecture Zeitgeist is a project that aims to popularize and make architecture education accessible. The game consists of 3D tours where the player will be able to visit and interact in real time with iconic architecture projects.

name: Mojito the Cat: Easter Edition
description: Jump into action in this quirky puzzle game. Travel the world along with an adorable cat named Mojito (or one of his friends).

name: Hexes
description:
Hexes, a new puzzle game from Elektri.

Move gems across the game board to get matches of 3. But, watch out, moving a single gem will move all gems, and adds more gems to the board.

Plan your moves carefully. Once the board is full of gems its game over. Matching 3 or more gems will remove them from the board and keep your game going.

With lots of challenge and replay-ability, how high will your score in Hexes be?

name: Mojito the Cat: Easter
description: Enjoy Easter time with an adorable cat named Mojito or one of his friends.

name: March, March! European Warfare
description: A minimalistic, turn-based wargame without randomness that puts emphasis on outmanouvering and striking the enemy with diverse unit types. Fight in the field, besiege forts or hunt down enemy king in local or streamed PvP. Illustrated with digitized, centuries-old copperplates.

name: Space Slaughter
description: Test your skill while trying to unlock all ships by fighting on 6 unique maps full of different kind of enemies!

name: Artist Life Simulator: Cakes and Guns
description: Adds 200+ new events, 14 Cakes, 9 Pistols, ~100 illustrations & other new content to the base game. Fully save compatible.

name: Quiz Thiz Croatia
description: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Tax Heaven 3000
description: Tax Heaven 3000 is a visual novel dating game that actually prepares your 2022 US federal tax return! Romance Iris, a cheerful and easygoing girl who is oddly interested in your personal finances. Maximize your deductions, and charm your way into her heart!

name: Democracy 4: Event Pack
description: Give Democracy 4 a boost with these extra events to liven up the game. Will you still be able to maintain control of the country, and command the respect of the voters? or will your term in office be derailed by the tragic course of events!

name: Silver Box Classics
description: This collection brings back a gathering of adaptations of the events in the first four Dragonlance role-playing modules, at the beginning of the War of the Lance. These are the first video games adaptations of D&D that started it all.

name: Amazo
description: Amazo is an Adventure action game with platform elements set in the Amazon rainforest. In it, you will have to fight mysterious enemies, double jump to reach high locations and avoid falling into deep abyss. On your journey, You will have the help of a little girl and a monkey. Come on, let's go!

name: That Racecar Game
description: Casual Racing Experience. Play against friends locally, or against the AI.

name: Industrial War
description: Explore the world In the 1920s, with more than 800 cities and 200 mines. Know your industrial chain and plan the role of each city; know your nation's unique polity structure and adjust your overall strategy. Resist the restlessness of your neighbors, acquire resources, and develop your industry.

name: Sushi Time!: Premium Edition
description: Welcome to Sushi Time! Manage a sushi bar and become a tycoon of Japanese food! Try to deliver the orders on time, but be careful not to mix them up! Upgrade your bar and beautify it, so that you'll be able to create the best sushi in town!

name: Hullbreakers
description: Hullbreakers is a space arcade game with fast paced combat, quick maneuvering, and strategy. Use an ever-evolving spacecraft to wipe out endless hordes of enemies and relentless bosses in order to make your mark on the leaderboard.

name: Redumption
description: Redumption is an action adventure game where you explore a town consumed by the waste. Fight bosses and retrieve precious items to save your friends from the witch's curse. Can you clean up the town and achieve redumption?

name: Heartwood Heroes
description: A fast-paced board game for up to 4 players featuring humorous quests, quick turn-based combat and multiple-choice events. Explore the board, equip your character, get a job, and fight to become Hero of the Week! Play locally or online with Steam Remote Play.

name: Chinese Expeditionary Force: Assault Team
description: Chinese Expeditionary Force - Assault Team is a tactical stealth game set in the expedition of the Chinese Expeditionary Force to Burma during World War II. The assault team consists of five characters, each with their own special skills. You can use different strategies to complete the mission.

name: The Shivers
description: The Shivers is a Co-Op horror game that can be played with a maximum of 4 people and at least 1 person. Your goal is to detect the evil spirit type in cursed places with your team or alone by using your equipment.

name: The Secret Life of Dorian Pink
description: A choices-matter narrative RPG set in an alternate universe of the Picture of Dorian Gray by Oscar Wilde. Save your boyfriend Basil from the Devil by making questionable choices, gaining allies, and making doughnuts explode.

name: Age of Gladiators: Reforged
description: Age of Gladiators Reforged is a remake of the 2016 indie game. A single-player strategy/management experience set at the height of the bloody gladiatorial games in ancient Rome that allows you to manage your fighters as they increase in level, forging them into killing machines and champions.

name: Netherguild
description: Netherguild is a turn-based tactical roguelite dungeon-crawler, in which the player commands expeditions below the earth in a desperate attempt to cure a strange plague. Explore, camp, and fight as far as you can before heading back to resupply.

name: Super Sketchy Party
description: A drawing guessing party game for at least 3 players. Played with your smartphone and works locally and online combined for the ultimate fun.

name: 9 Years of Shadows
description: 9 Years of Shadows is an emotionally-driven Metroidvania, enhanced by healing music that tells the story of Europa, a young woman of noble birth tasked with ending the curse that plagues her people and restoring color to all lands.

name: Orders of the Ruler
description: Orders of the Ruler is a indie RTS game which has you commanding your folk in a medieval world. You are the Ruler and your mission is protect your lands while invading others. Face other Ruler's for the sake of wealth and honor. Command your army, build your base, gather resources and improve.

name: Drakkar Crew
description: Hey rookie, climb aboard! We're heading for adventure across the North Sea on our reliable Viking ship! Choose from one of the charismatic characters, hire some warriors and engage in bloody battles!

name: Lurn 2 Shell
description: Sin descripción

name: MineSorter
description: Put mines in the correct folder before they explode! Drag to select multiple mines for more score.

name: My Uncle's Story
description:
Tired of life you can only think of getting out and making it all stop.

Thus, one day you found an adventuring magazine with survival tips and decided to run from it all. One day after work, determined to full fill this dream, you set out to build your new home in the middle of the Forest.

With only an handful of tools in your bag and an old truck, you begin building your house, log by log.

What could possibly go wrong...

name: Mooshie's Kitchen 2
description: Welcome back to Mooshie's Kitchen! Things have changed since you were last here...

name: OHM 2
description: OHM2 is a compilation of 32 maps that have been made in about an hour each. The idea of this "project" was to make a map in one hour, and then record yourself play the previous map that was posted.

name: Super Mario World: The Princess Rescue 3 - The Turnabout
description:
This hack is a direct sequel to the hacks SMW The Princess Rescue (released 2017) and SMW The Princess Rescue 2:Luigi's Journey(2019).
In those two hacks Mario and Luigi both went simultaneously in their own adventures to save their beloved Princess Peach and Daisy from the clutches of Bowser and Tatanga.

At the end of their adventures both went on a honeymoon with their Princesses and here is where SMWTPR3 start.

This time around the Princesses will finally have their time to shine in this role-reversal SMW hack where you play as Princess Peach and Daisy going into a mission to rescue their beloved plumbers.

This hack has:
- 88 new levels with 120 exits to find
- Custom graphics (mostly similar or in SMW artstyle)
- Custom music
- Custom sprites and bosses
- A new powerup
- Lots of ASM
- English and Brazilian Portuguese localization
and more.
